name: Forever Skin Perfect 24H Multi-Use Foundation Stick
about: What it is: The innovative multi-use foundation stick that delivers a natural, blurred finish, 24h* coverage, and all-day hydration.**..Finish: Natural.Formulation: Stick..What Else You Need to Know: This buildable foundation stick glides on smoothly, evening out your complexion and eliminating imperfections in a single swipe. The heat- and humidity-resistant formula has a blurring filter effect and can be used as a foundation or concealer for touch-ups on the go...Clinical Results: In an instrumental test on 25 subjects:.- It provided 24 hours of wear..In an instrumental test on 33 subjects:.- It provided all-day hydration
ingredients: C15-19 Alkane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Saccharomyces Ferment, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Silica, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Mica, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Aluminum Hydroxide, Parfum (Fragrance), Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax), Lauroyl Lysine, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Aqua (Water), Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, [+/- CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.As a foundation:.-Apply directly to your cheeks, nose, forehead, and chin with the flat part of the oval and then blend with your fingertips, the Dior Backstage Face Brush N°18, or the Dior Backstage Beauty Blender (each sold separately). ..As a concealer:.-Apply to targeted areas, then blend using your fingertips, the Dior Backstage Face Brush N°18, or the Dior Backstage Beauty Blender (each sold separately)...For touch-ups:.-Apply anytime.

reviews.review_title: enhances your complexion while feeling comfortable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: **Forever Skin Perfect Review**    Forever Skin Perfect delivers on its promise of a natural, flawless finish. The lightweight formula blends effortlessly, offering buildable coverage that doesn’t feel cakey. It leaves a smooth, semi-matte look that lasts throughout the day without settling into fine lines. While it works beautifully for normal to combination skin, those with very dry or oily skin may need additional prep or touch-ups. Overall, it’s a versatile product that enhances your complexion while feeling comfortable and breathable.

reviews.review_title: Flawless coverage when skin is hydrated
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky to be able to test the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick in exchange for my honest review. I used shade 2.5N which I felt was the perfect match for my skin tone. I used this for about three months before reviewing. This is a great option for anyone looking for a high-quality, easy-to-use foundation. The product has a lovely, subtle fragrance that adds a luxurious touch without being overwhelming, and the sleek, cute packaging makes it feel even more special. The stick format is incredibly convenient, allowing for quick and precise application, and it blends effortlessly for a natural finish. One of its best features is that it doesn’t feel cakey on the skin, offering solid coverage without a heavy feel. However, I’ve noticed that sometimes it doesn’t sit evenly, especially on drier or textured areas of my skin, which requires a little extra attention during application to ensure a smooth finish. Overall, it’s a reliable and user-friendly product that delivers a beautiful look, but it’s important to prep your skin well for best results.

reviews.review_title: The Product That Brought Me Back to Dior Makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use exclusively Dior but branched out since the pandemic. Generally speaking, I think Dior makes solid complexion products for my skin tone/type but this one stands out to me. Personally, I hate doing a full face of makeup everyday and this toes the line perfectly for a daily concealer/foundation. I swipe under my eyes and a little on my forehead and chin, then blend with my fingers and I look a bit more put together. Overall, I love how versatile this product is, I can use a brush or beauty blender or just my fingers when applying; and I can use it as a targeted concealer with my regular foundation. I especially like how the formula feels very light and more like skincare than layering a thick liquid on my face. It's a convenient size to throw in my purse compared to other foundations that I was unlikely to reapply throughout the day. 10/10 from me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had some high hopes for this one.  I am giving it 2 stars for the color.  It definitely matched my odd skin tone, which is unusual.  It went straight to my pores, however, giving me a definite polka dot pore situation.  I tried every single primer I have, including Tatcha, Lancome, MAC, Milk, and no primer whatsoever, just skincare.  Nothing worked.  I really wish this was not the case.  I also tried applying straight to face, brush to product, and warm on hand - apply to face.  None of these had a positive effect either.  I will use it for my online meetings but it looks ludicrous in person.  Not a happy person.

When I don’t use something to sheer it out, it does have a tendency to look a little like mousse. 4/5 stars bc it’s easy and beautiful and by far the best stick formula I’ve tried.

I would still recommend that people try just may not be the best fit for everyone’s skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick is way too scented, even for Dior!  I know if they didn’t add the fragrance it would smell like oil paint, but it’s way too much. It’s also not dry skin friendly.  There’s a reason why Hailey Bieber has to apply it with a milky toner. If you have combo or oily skin, it will look beautiful. But I need intense skin prep in order not to show scaly patches between my eyebrows and around my nose.

The Dior Forever Skin Foundation Stick offers a luxurious and versatile base for achieving a flawless complexion. Its creamy texture glides on smoothly and provides full coverage without feeling heavy or cakey. The formula blends easily into the skin, offering a matte finish with a natural-looking radiance that lasts throughout the day. i love that its buildable coverage, making it suitable for everything from light touch-ups to full-face application. The foundation also has excellent staying power, resisting oxidation and fading over time.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love but broke me out; heavily scented
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want the ease of a foundation stick, but all have left a patchy and dry finish (I’m combination skin). This was the first stick that glided on smoothly, blurred pores, felt light but buildable, and left a satin finish. I get the hype and really wanted to love this. But it broke me out - bad. I do not have sensitive skin and am not prone to breakouts. I did a patch test on the right side and broke out, but loved it so much tried my whole face and hoped it wasn’t this. Well, it was! And after multiple tries hoping my skin would get used to it, it didn’t. My skin is starting to normalize, but definitely the pimples and zits on my right side are taking its time. Definitely test this first! Also, this is highly scented so beware.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Hi. I bought a Forever Skin Perfect 24H Multi-Use Foundation Stick at Sephora and I want to say that it is bad and how can you sell it, I have never had so many pimples and comedones and I can't return it anymore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation stick! It saves a few minutes getting ready in the morning and I need that! It’s worth the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This formula glides on smooth & blends like a dream. I’m not usually a fan of stick foundations & find them to be cakey but this one is buttery. For some reason I’m a 2.5N in the stick & a 2.5W in the liquid. It could be because the stick is made in Japan & the liquid is made in France.

reviews.review_title: I really wanted to love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When you first apply this, it goes on flawlessly. However with time it separates from your face! Beautiful texture but unfortunately no matter how many different primers I used, it separated. Please re formulate this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love this product!! It has become part of my go to routine. It blends sooo easy and you really don’t need a lot of product to achieve a flawless look. It looks so natural and also has a really lovely scent. Definitely worth the splurge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely beautiful and natural looking.  If you love Tom Ford stick foundation, this is just as great. It is also comparable in finish and wear!  This has become my new favorite foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so skeptical on getting this just because of the price. But I caved during the sale and omg I have no regrets. It applies like butter and blends like a dream. With a good primer and setting powder it will stay put all day long! I’ve never spent so much on a foundation but I have to say it’s truly worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really tried to like it.. I tried Shade 1 and it was darker than I expected so I exchanged it for Shade 0 and while the shade match was okay, it looked super patchy on my face.. I tried with primer, without, different skincare products with it but still didn’t work for me.. most likely will return :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had a picture of this but somehow it got removed from my photos… anyways, I loved loved loved this! It is a luxury product and it is obvious in the quality. It goes on smooth. It has a natural look. The coverage I would say is medium to full which is what I prefer. It comes in a stick that makes it easier to apply and less messy. 5 stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product but I don’t care for the fragrance, the limited shade range which could make color matching difficult for some people, and the price tag. Otherwise though, applies like a dream and finishes beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t bought a new foundation in years. I usually stick to it cosmetics full coverage foundation. I have rosacea so my skin is very red and sensitive. I was very surprised when I put this on. It glides on so easy and blends like a dream. I’m obsessed and its buildable will be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on easily. Blends easily.  Once I’d figure out the right color, i love the product.  Easy no mess application, nice for a purse…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it. The shade range is terrible but I did find my shade. It blends perfectly into my skin even though I’m a warm undertone. It looks like my skin and sits pretty on my face.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not sponsored - really like this. It is much more creamy and blendable than normal stick foundations. I have normal/dry skin and it works but if your skin is very dry it might be a bit dry for you. 1.5n was perfect

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 CR Cool Rosy - light skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it coz it’s lightweight and it is perfect for my skin shade.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my routine now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love!! I have applied this foundation stick on three times now and have got compliments on my makeup and skin every time. The color is definitely my summer shade but I will be purchasing 2.5N also for winter. It looks so beautiful on the skin and blends like a dream. I have dry skin but as long as I prep my face properly it’s great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product. It felt so nice on my skin & had a beautiful finish but unfortunately it sinks into my pores & fine lines. Yes I do all my skincare & also tried with a pore filling primer. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This does everything the product description says it does. I have dry skin and this felt immediately hydrating when I applied it to my face. It also stayed in place all day, 8-10 hours.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Heavily fragranced and pricey. I wanted to love this as it goes on really nice and the coverage/finish is great but the scent ruined the whole thing for me. If you a scent sensitive this one might not be for you.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging, so sheek and the tube is large with a lot of product. With the correct shade this blends into a flawless coverage. Smells amazing and leaves my skin glowing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried this product with and without primer and about 5 different primers and it separates on my face. I do have large pores and it makes them more pronounced. There is a scent which I don’t mind but I’m going back to a  different brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, the texture and how it feels on my skin is just so beautiful. Its just so easy to use also. Bought in 3 shades already✨✨love everything about it .

reviews.review_title: Avoid if you dislike scented products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is ok, but the smell is offensive. It worked well enough for my dry skin, however if you are over forty like me, it will settle into lines and wrinkles. Needs major babysitting. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the foundations packaging! Very chic (; It goes on smooth, I don’t feel like it’s drying on my skin, I will have to use for longer to fully see how it works on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a Dior girlie, so I really wanted to love this. I tried several different prep and application techniques, but it kept separating on my skin. The scent wasn’t offensive, but it was strong. I will say the color stayed true, thus the 2 stars. Altogether: bummer. Too expensive for underperforming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation stick!  It wore all day long with little to no touch ups.  Best looking foundation I have tried to date and I’ve tried just about every brand!  Definitely worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every cent. This smooth beautiful buildable second skin has quickly become my favorite foundation despite the millions I have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not impressed with this, felt heavy and greasy, just sat on top of skin, highly fragranced, suspect that this is what made me break out, ended up returning. I prefer the Tom ford and hourglass stick foundations over this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Why do people like this? It broke me out, it looked mediocre at best no matter how I applied it. I have dry leaning normal skin, so my skin type seems like their target market. Dior has was better foundations, this isn’t it.

reviews.review_title: I’ve tried so many foundation formulas - THE BEST!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried serum skin tints. I’ve tried traditional foundations. I’ve tried other foundation sticks. This. One. Beats. Them. ALL. I am 52 (almost 53) with fair, sun-damaged, acne prone skin. LOVE! proneskin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t want to love it. But alas, it’s TOO good so I have to keep. Mid 40’s, have normal to dry skin. I prep with the ordinary serum and aveeno sensitive skin moisturizer and it looks great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't think I would like this foundation as much as I do. I have combination skin with an oily t zone and dryer cheeks. This foundation stick wears well across all areas of my face and stays nice all day, even through a workout.   pro tips:  > apply to moist skin. I use this over Dr Dennis Gross physical sunscreen which is hydrating.  > use a dense brush and/your fingers to apply. press in with your fingers for a more invisible application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Rouge member.  I've tried all the talked abut high end formulas.  This is my favorite.  I've never liked a stick formula before.  THIS IS IT!  Skin like, blends like a dream, satin finish.  Perfection.  Wears so well for hours.  Plays well with all my other products. Dry skin, nearly 50yo.  Every time I've worn this I get asked about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this foundation! Feels like nothin is on my skin. It was easy to blend and the packaging is super cute. Is definitely medium to full coverage and is more velvety than matte or dewy. My new fav! I recieved this free complimentary of influencer!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dior quality is always the best and I expected nothing less from this item. The color matched my skin tone perfectly and it left a flawless finish for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so nice. I’m 43 with fine lines and patches of red everywhere for some reason. Buildable, natural coverage.  Doesnt settle horribly into my wrinkles… She is going into the front of my rotation for now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would like but the fragrance of rose is sooo strong , why why why

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color was nice which is why it’s getting 2 stars but the scent is horrific. I feel like putting on makeup and my skin care regime is an experience. Adding this on my face was not fun it made me put on a sour face every time. The days I did use it I looked very oily even after

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It glides on so easily and blends like a dream. I have slightly oily skin so it isn’t the best once I get oily but as long as I keep blotting it’s great. The coverage is really good over my acne scars

reviews.review_title: Product melted in tube; felt dry and cakey
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought online and received via postal delivery. Most of the product was in the cap. I scraped out what I could and pushed it back into the tube. The good part is that the shade was right for me of buff neutral. The finish was very matte and seemed to emphasize and settle into fine lines. It was ok enough but not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Made my skin look super dry and patchy. Skin prepped like normal and it still looked dry and patchy on my skin. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far the worst foundation I have ever used in my life. It accentuated any imperfections on my skin, and it easily wipes away. I did not enjoy that it has fragrance. For the price, it is not worth it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It was my first time using a stick foundation! This glides right on and is full coverage. Super easy to blend with a brush or sponge. Great for everyday use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re still hesitating to buy this, DO IT. You won’t regret it. Beautiful formula, lasts all day, glowy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m typically a tinted moisturizer girl, but wanted a little more coverage for winter. This is by far the best color match I’ve ever had in a foundation- the undertone is perfect and not too pink. I also love how it feels light, but covers really well. Will be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it’s soooo nice on my skin but it breaks me out so much. i think the fragrance is a looottttt. I’ve been testing it out for about a month and it’s literally so amazing on my skin but i swear i break out like crazy every time i wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It clogged in the pores which makes it extremely visible on skin. Finish is nice. If you don’t have pores it will look stunning on you.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was heavily influenced to buy this from some influencer, but the biggest turn off is the overwhelming scent. I like a little scent to products, but this is extremely overpowering, like spraying perfume on your face and you can’t escape it. Also is very kinky. I like the hourglass foundation stick better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, I really did. At first, the foundation would lay on beautifully and blend seamlessly. However, due to my dry skin, I have to do an immense amount of skin prep so it doesn’t automatically pill upon application. After a few hours of wear, the foundation would cling onto my dry patches and look terrible. It’s such a shame because I heard this is great for dry skin and it’s also expensive. I do would recommend for anyone else who doesn’t have dry skin or if it somehow works for someone with dry skin. I seen the foundation work for others, so it just depends how your skin reacts. Does not work for me, though, and I sadly won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love how my face looks.  Feels like silk.  My favorite foundation. And I have tried all.  CT, Chanel, PatMcGrath,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i got this after seeing all the reviews and it definitely surpassed my expectations. the coverage is amazing while also not being heavy. you can make it super light or build it up. im obsessed!

reviews.review_title: Obsessed! It’s really as good as they say
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: **not paid or incentivized for this honest review lol*** I have very oily skin so it is hard for me to find a foundation that doesn’t breakdown under my oil throughout the day, truth be told my expectations were extremely low this would work for me. I also shocked. This is my new favorite! It looks so natural on the skin, it doesn’t break down at all. I am so impressed with this! It is now my staple foundation. It also feels so light, looks skin like and not cakey. It’s literally everything I wanted it to be. I am so happy I gave this a chance. It has blown me away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this stick is so creamy and easy to blend, looks flawless with other makeup. it does oxidize a tiny bit and look darker, but that's my only complaint. worth it ;)

reviews.review_title: Orange on my skin but very good formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good formula but is so orange on my skin. My skin is light to medium with a warm olive tone to it. This was sooooooo orange. But if you’re okay with that this formula is perfect. I had to return it because there’s no point in having a foundation that you have to adjust.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good. I never ever use foundation but I wanted to start and this is perfect for me. I could never find a shade that was light enough for me but Dior has it! the It doesn’t oxide as orange I love it!! me a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation stick! Honestly I don’t even need primer! It goes on so smooth and blends beautifully with a wet sponge! I will 100% be purchasing when mine runs out. YOU NEED THIS TRUST ME.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shades that are a PERFECT match, but unfortunately it looks TERRIBLE if you have dry skin. The formula separates when applied and looks super patchy :( Will have to stick to my Armani Luminous Silk

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered the wrong shade of this product. so I am_ unfortunately able to test this as a foundation, but I am able to test this as bronzer or contour, should I say. i am still very pleased with the product.And I was able to make things work. the blendability in the formula is absolutely perfect. The formula sits well on even rough skin..

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Listen, my MUA bestie put me on this! When I say it’s THE BEST! Believe me! Worth every penny! Dior knows what they are doing in the beauty world

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really did not want to believe the hype. But OMG this foundation is smooth and goes on like butter. Lasted 10+ hours. A small amount goes a long way. Tan girls who are NC 42-44 can make shade 4N work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster for testing purposes. This is my first time trying a stick foundation + I love how easy it is to apply. It glides easily, is a perfect shade match, + blends beautifully with a sponge. It does accentuate pores upon the initial swipe, but becomes unnoticeable once blended. There’s a slight scent that I enjoy, but it’s nowhere near overpowering. I’d say this is full coverage + is something I’d definitely consider buying in the future. Would absolutely recommend this foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 CR Cool Rosy - very light skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am acne-prone, but my skin is not super sensitive otherwise. This product gave me a severe reaction and it has still not subsided. The fragrance is intense, and I think it is the reason for the reaction. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this during sale The formula is beautiful. The shade match is perfect but ladies, I just happen to roll the stick all the way out to see how much I have. It’s barely over an inch barely this is ridiculous for the price they charge in the amount they’re giving you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot believe how stunning this product is. I was exploring other foundation options because as winter arrives, my skin gets dry patches and I was worried that my holy grail EL Double-Wear would cling to them. This is the first time I've ever used a foundation stick and I am so glad I took the leap. I use Sephora's 47 foundation brush to apply. I notice I don't really need much product to even out my skin tone. It smooths out beautifully, works well with my other products (Makeup by Mario bronzer, Natasha Denona concealer, and Patrick Ta blush). It lasts ALL DAY. It doesn't cling to dry patches, it doesn't break up in my T-zone, and makes my skin look yummy and hydrated. Note that I haven't used setting powder with it, just the One Size setting spray. I am a FAN!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage of this product was great! I ordered the wrong shade by accident, but nonetheless, the product performed so but better than I thought I would! The packaging was so durable and pretty as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can finally stop the hunt for foundations. I love this one, it’s a perfect match for me. It looks like skin, it feels like skin, it gives buildable coverage while feeling like you have nothing on. I’m totally obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 57 years old. I have been wearing makeup since I was 17. This is the best foundation I have ever used. I thought it was pricey at first. But I feel it will is worth every penny, and so am I 😉.I have been wearing this foundation for two weeks now

reviews.review_title: Why did it fall out of packaging?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product but on the second use it just fell out of the packaging?! Like why?! For $52 I expected better Dior

reviews.review_title: NOT for the dry skin girlies 😭
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product so much. It was a PERFECT color match and I liked how easy it was to apply. However, my cheeks and under eyes are dry, and with this foundation, you could see EVERY CRACK AND CREVISE

reviews.review_title: Beautiful foundation but smells SO intense.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is so STRONG. I knew it was a fragranced product but I was surprised just how intense the smell is. It feels like wearing perfume on my face. If this was unscented it would be 5 stars for me but I might return it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looked good when I first tried it and then the next time it looked terrible on my skin. It did not blend well at all on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite foundation. It is my first time using a stick foundation as well and I could not be more impressed. The product blends into my skin so easily and the formula is perfect.

reviews.review_title: Amazing but not for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this product! The color was a 100% match (I’m fair and 0N worked perfectly for me!), it blended like a dream and the finish was very natural while covering everything that needs to be covered. I like how natural and perfect my skin looked like. The scent is also very luxurious and nice. However, my face was a bit itchy throughout the night and I got a couple of pimples afterwards so had to return. Try it and see if you skin tolerates it! The product itself is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely one of the best foundations I have ever tried! It’s so easy to apply- melts into your skin so perfectly! The color blends wonderfully with my skin tone as well, honestly feels amazing. Not heavy… worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so disappointed!  I read so many raving reviews on this product.   I even went to the store to get shade matched.  As you can see from the pictures, it wore off and became patchy. My teen daughter even commented if I wore any foundation and that I looked tired.  This is being returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed, it oxidises and was not smoothing in fact it emphasized pores that I don't normally notice. For the price it should at least be better than drugstore options. Overhyped, I wish I didn't get sold by the influencer reviews-gotta stop trusting them. Let's get back to real reviews of products so we stop wasting our hard earned money and time.

reviews.review_title: It’s okay, but the Fenty stick is nicer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The dior stick foundation was okay. There are products less expensive and work just as well, WITHOUT unnecessary fragrance. For that reason, I gave this 2 stars. Returning it tomorrow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect. The finish js great. It is very easy to blend. Coverage is perfect. Packing was cute! Not very scented! I would definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the product but my one critique is that they run way too yellow. There is no proper cool ivory shade so us pale girls are out of luck. Blends very well though and I like how easy it would be to travel and throw in your makeup bag. Hopefully they extend the shade range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this foundation especially since the way it was so hyped up, but unfortunately I was highly disappointed! Yes it has a beautiful finish and blends seamlessly into the skin, but the way it accentuates every bit of texture and pore is awful! The foundation not only alerted it also does not last more than 5 hours on my oily combo skin. I have tried many setting powders as well as different primers and nothing works.

reviews.review_title: Perfect match for skin overall but pricy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick is literally a perfect match the shade, and everything I even like the scent! The only thing I don’t like is the price, but I understand it is a luxury brand, but I will re-purchase in the future via discount!￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! This is creamy and glides seamlessly on my skin. It works in a high humidity climate. It blends easily and looks super natural, not cakey or heavy in any way. Will definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say, the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick is a must-have for my makeup routine. The formula is lightweight and feels like second skin, while offering a natural, glowing finish. It blurs imperfections and covers up blemishes effortlessly, leaving me with a flawless complexion. The stick format is also super convenient and makes it easy to touch up on the go. I'm definitely adding it to my list of holy grail makeup products.

reviews.review_title: Best invention this year. The winner is Dior!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you to the innovators at Dior for creating this amazing beautiful product that works like a charm. Tom Ford discontinued their fabulous stick foundation but this is a sweet and much needed replacement. Well done Dior!

Pas une grosse fan de foundation à la base. Mais celui-ci j’adore! Ma peau reste belle, pas de mottons et pas d’odeur désagréable. J’ai la peau sensible, je réagit quand il y a trop de parfum, mais pas avec Dior! Je recommande!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hardly write reviews but this is worth it. Goes on silky smooth, light, yet medium buildable coverage. I like this so much more than I expected. It’s a must buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation blends beautifully. It is like a second skin. Has a soft blurring effect. Medium coverage and lasts all day. I have finally found my perfect everyday foundation. Thank you Dior!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this foundation. Super creamy, easy to blend and looks stunning on my dry skin. The only issue I have is it does oxidize half a shade to a shade darker on me. once they come back in stock I’ll be buying the 1.5 shade and see if that oxidizes to my perfect color 👌🏼 I added a photo; the lighter shade is my correct shade (hands are darker than my face and neck)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Dior makeup. This literally makes my skin flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. It has a gorgeous finish and blended like a dream. I received this from influenster for my review however i will be buying a new shade with my own money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture and it’s very easy to apply. But, I couldn’t find my color match. I got 0N and it’s too light and the next color is 1N that is too dark. So I had to return it. I will buy it again if Dior brings new colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product. It laid on really nicely and looked natural, however the fragrance is not meant for people for sensitive skin. Sadly had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is sooo good. It blends so easily and feels lightweight. It has a natural finish on my skin. I do have to set it with powder in my tzone but after that it lasts all day. And it doesn’t clog my pores like other stick foundations have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This may be great for younger skin, but definitely not for aging/mature skin. Felt very heavy and accentuated lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed , it oxidises and becomes orangy , it shows all imperfections, somehow it gets into my pores but doesn’t cover the skin around them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product but it separates on my face after only a couple hours. Not worth the price and doesn’t live up the claims.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are 50 or older, test it before buying. I’m glad I did, because I was planning to purchase it. This is an okay product, but far from great. It provides a subtle glow, which is nice, but it accentuates pores and does nothing for wrinkles. I haven't noticed any 'blurring' at all. There are better foundations available for mature women. The hype is because it's Dior...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Looks beautiful on the skin!! Not cakey and makes your skin look flawless

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 CR Cool Rosy - very light skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's really great. high coverage 👍 the only problem is that it's a little oily and you need to use setting powder to fix it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a light olive complexion with a neutral undertone and this is the first foundation that was ever a perfect match! I use a kabuki brush and it goes on smoothly and blurs with just a little product. Warming though: this does have a floral scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. The coverage is absolutely flawless, providing a smooth and even finish that lasts all day. It's incredibly easy to apply, thanks to the stick format, which makes it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. The formula is lightweight yet buildable, allowing me to achieve anything from a natural look to full coverage without feeling heavy on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Application was incredibly easy, I have dry skin and as long as I do my usual skincare routine before, it doesn’t cling to any dry patches at all. The finish is natural teetering on matte.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great! It is easy to apply and blend and smells good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I chose a sculpting stick for myself, I took a color darker than necessary, since I do not use foundation. The texture is quite dense and can cover up redness and unevenness of the skin. But it does not shade very well, this is the main disadvantage for me. It has no unpleasant smell, the packaging is very convenient, you can take it with you.

reviews.review_title: 10/10 so easy to blend and natural finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very natural finish. You need to be very moisturized for this to blend out nicely. If you have a dry patches it will cling a little bit, as with any foundation. Brushes, fingers or a sponge it looks beautiful however you choose to apply I give it a 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Strong pigment with good coverage and a good finish, not sparkly and could even be used as almost like a foundation. Very easy to blend into my makeup for a great contour!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: CAN YOU BE MORE INCLUSIVE? MEDIOCRE RANGE FOR SUCH A REPUTABLE AND HIGH END BRAND. YOU HAVE THE FUNDS! GET BACK TO THE LABS DIOR!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage the finish is beautiful dewy and super blend able the packaging is like because it makes applying the product super easy and hastle free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade I received was too dark for me but I made the best of it and played around with it. It worked out great as a bronzer for me. I was sold just on the scent! It smells floral and just fresh. It has a semi matte finish and the consistency is creamy and hydrating. I received this product in exchange for my honest review from Influenster.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 5 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super creamy and lightweight. I love the packaging. It’s super for convenient for travel. There’s a wide shade range available and it was easy for me to match my complexion. It has a nice coverage, more buildable though. Soft matte like finish. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfection thats the word to describe this stick it blends out smoothly a lit bit oily but using a mattifying primer will help, I used my lancome primer la base and it works perfectly with this base is a very natural finsih

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First Dior foundation I’ve tried and it feels and looks amazing. I set it and it lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hollay mollay. Tried that in store on my hands. It was smooth and a good color match. My shade wasn’t available in store including the other shade I was debating getting. This is it. The holy grail of foundation. It’s smooth. Feel like NOTHING ON. Ain’t going back. Worth every penny. You need this in your life. God it’s so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Dior in exchange for my honest opinion of the product. I loved this product because it blends easily and the result is natural. The packaging is beautiful and convenient to carry in your bag  everywhere. It has a delicate smell. I recommend it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WHAT IS IN THIS??! I hate foundation - I’m a tinted SPF or tinted moisturizer gal…..until this formula! It has such a light, creamy, blend-able, moisturizing, skin-like finish to it - it is magical. I work in cosmetic dermatology and I have received so many compliments from patients and coworkers after wearing it today. I haven’t changed anything else and as a matter of fact I’m breaking out currently… lol. This is the one people - try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product. I didn't think I would.  But I love it.  It's so easy to use and blends in perfectly with my skin. I usually use Armani. But this will be my new go to.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 0 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love most dior beauty products. It goes on smooth and does a great job with coverage. Easy to blend. Hard to shade match so I recommend using testers at the store prior to purchase Received this product as a free sample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love , love this foundation stick.  Then product glides on so easy, no tugging or pulling on the skin.  Lasts for hours and matches my complexion perfectly l!

reviews.review_title: It's 2024. Let's stop with the fragrance.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WHY DIOR WHY? This foundation is so beautiful, easy to blend, long lasting, BUT the scent is so strong if you are a scent sensitive person. I was hoping that it would dissipate but I could smell it all day. It was so distracting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this product! It’s goes on very smooth and isn’t cakey. It blends in well and the pigment is very close to my pigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by this product with its super creamy formula when I open the packaging. Once blended in,it does have a nice blurring affect after application. The only downside is that this foundation is scented! I would have given it a higher rating if not for the scent, it reminds of the Miss Dior perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good foundation stick. Unfortunately I was sent a shade way too dark for my skin tone, so I can’t use it as an all over foundation. But I was able to use it as a bronzer. It blends out well and looks good on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dior is the best makeup line in my opinion and this Forever Skin Perfect proved my theory. This is my skin after using it (no concealer under it). I loved how natural my skin looks! The shade range is awesome as well! Plus for the packaging: so charming!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sleek packaging lovely finish. Blends perfectly and doesn't budget all day. Not feathering and easy to apply. Great full coverage. Smells great and leaves skin glowing and flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm unpleasantly surprised by this product. It goes on dry and cakes horribly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my new favorite product. This product is very high coverage but is also very hydrating. A little goes a very long way, it’s is blends flawlessly and doesn’t seem to crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for these couple of days, I like the texture. Packaging is so elegant. The coverage I would say it medium and gives a nice finish to the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally one of the best makeup products i’ve ever used. I’m usually not a foundation girle but ever since i got this i’ve been obsessed with it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t believe how wonderful this is! It goes on like butter (but light). Blends very easily. I haven’t tested the 24-hour wear but after a full day and evening it still looked smooth and uncreased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stick foundation has nice full coverage and it blends pretty well with a blending sponge! I typically wear a neutral in foundations, but this neutral had slightly more yellow in it than neutral shades usually have. It had good longevity and wear throughout the day. My only big complaint was that it looked a little bit chalky on my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product from Influenster for my honest opinion. Glides on sooo smooth! A beautiful rich brown color, although it was a little darker than my complexion I’m able to use it as a contour. It’s not muddy looking like other brands and it doesn’t oxidize either which is a plus. Would definitely purchase again in a shade down!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product from Influenster for my honest opinion. Glides on sooo smooth! A beautiful rich brown color, although it was a little darker than my complexion I’m able to use it as a contour. It’s not muddy looking like other brands and it doesn’t oxidize either which is a plus. Would definitely purchase again in a shade down!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this at first because Dior and Danessa get me with their .5 shade options, but my God I cannot deal with the smell. And honestly it also broke me out, probably because of the smell. Dior will never change that so I will stick to Danessa

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 CR Cool Rosy - very light skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sits into all skin texture and pills really bad:( not worth the price at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I shade matched at 1.5N but it was a bit too yellow for my complexion so I got 1N. I am OBSESSED with how it made my skin look and feel. It’s very blurring and light weight. It feels like I’m not wearing any make up at all. The scent is also so nice. 10/10 The scent is also

reviews.review_title: So creamy with a blur effect
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a winter palette (dark hair, dark eyes, light neutral skin). 2N was the perfect match for me, 2.5 is a little more dark and yellow. I used both on different areas of my face and blended them out. Smooth application. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really had high hopes for this product after seeing so many great reviews, but it did not work with my skin type. It clung to dry patches and made my makeup look cakey. 2 stars because the shade match was great.

reviews.review_title: The perfect full coverage foundation stick
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is amazing, I’ve used this on so many clients looking to cover redness, acne/scarring, dark spots and hyperpigmentation, etc. It’s worked wonders and everyone loves it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift from influenster in exchange for my honest review. I usually don’t like stick concealers as they tend to be dry but this was very creamy and long lasting

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very skeptical at first because I have dry skin and stick foundations have not worked well for me but this is great. build able coverage and a natural/radiant finish. long lasting. cannot say enough good things!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so this is amazing. Like, AMAZING. It’s literally so creamy like nothing I’ve ever used before. It glides on smoothly and blends really well with both a beauty blender and brush. It matched my skin tone to a T. I used it as just a concealer some days and also as a full face foundation and it came out flawless. Love this and will definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was developed perfectly! It goes on smoothly, coverage is so good, easy to blend out, easy to add more where needed. Finish leaves me feeling natural with coverage. Being able to apply right to face instead of having to sap or spill anything makes it a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If there's one thing you must know, it's that this will absolutely give you a perfect blur effect. I have a bit of acne scars and you won't notice it with this foundation. My only cons are 1. I bought a shade too deep for me, since 3N wasn't available 2. If you have oily skin, your T zone will get a bit greasy after a few hours. For the rest, this foundation is 100% worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dior forever skin perfect glides on smooth but in my opinion takes a little effort to blend. I enjoy the convenience of the stick version. As for the wearability I haven’t been able to give an all day wear test because the color I received looks orange on my skin, I believe if I try a different shade it would be great. I do enjoy the liquid version of this foundation so I’m hoping once the color is matched correctly it will be great. This is scented for those sensitive to fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This caused me to break out within 24 hours of use. Lots of red, angry pimples, especially where I applied it directly. Not worth it at all. Also, don’t love that it has a fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a luxurious foundation stick! I’ve never used a balm before but this goes on easily as a concealer or all over foundation. The coverage is medium but can be built up to full, and has a beautiful natural blurring finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin (oily + dry FTW) and I LOVE this foundation. It can be hard to find a foundation that’s glowy but not greasy on oily skin. I do skin prep first (wash face , moisturizer & eye cream) and elf’s power grip primer and with a light powdering the foundation lasts MOST of the day.  If I set with a setting spray (currently one size) then it lasts 10 hours on me. It does get shiny towards the end of the day , but that’s to be expected.  The one downside is that it’s expensive .. however I’m hoping refills will come out for this because the component does come out.

reviews.review_title: Pulls different skin tones than normal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was completely influenced. I wanted to love this product however there wasn’t a good match for my skin tone.  It did feel good on my skin as if I wasn’t wearing any foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! I love a stick foundation, it just makes everything so easy & mess free. I can easily control the level of coverage which I also love because I’m not always a full coverage girly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been an avid stick foundation user for nearly 20 years- Westman Atelier and Bobbi Brown are 2 favorites. This new Dior is NOT it. This was patchy, dry, and emphasized the minimal texture my skin possesses. No moisturizer or primer combo in my arsenal was sufficient to combat these issues. Back this goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow I love this so much. It’s creamy and gives coverage without looking like makeup on your skin. The application is so convenient. Worth every penny. Love.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review.   Unfortunately I got sent a super dark shade, but I'm using it as a contour stick and it's working great. A little bit goes a long way in my case, but it blends very nicely. I wish I could try it as it's intended purpose, but it's still a nice product.   The packaging is a little weird/unique. Unfortunately when I first opened it the inside popped out and dented the product, but since then it opens properly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick is great, I love the retractable stick. The shade is perfect and it has great coverage. Feels smooth and it's easy to spread.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applies beautifully looks natural on my mature skin.  Will be buying again.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful product, all the way down to packaging!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using Dior Forever Skin Perfect for the last few weeks, I’ve really fallen in love!  I am someone who is always on the go, so I try to have products in my line up that suit this lifestyle. Stick foundations and I have a complicated relationship, but I’ve been eager to find the right one. I think I found it with Dior.   This foundation goes in SO smooth and blends like silk into my skin. I think I found the right shade, too, which can usually be a challenge for me.   The product is hydrating and stays on all day. It’s always handy to correct and blur in a pinch. Love love love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute packaging as always the color matches my skin perfectly and is super smooth and easy to apply I love that is not oily and is not dry either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what to say. Honestly I was heavily influenced online to purchase this product and was really excited about the formula I was seeing and the easy, creamy application that it had on others. This was not my experience. I tried it with a variety of combinations of skin care, etc and every time it just looked cakey and settled into the pores in an unattractive way. I wish I could give this a great review but it just wasn't my experience. So sad about it. Will be returning it and looking into other stick formulas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Has a really nice finish but it didn’t work well on my more set areas. Also, when I received it, there was oil that had seeped out. I’m assuming it was the fragrance they use in it. I thought it was because of the mail and how warm it was out but even leaving it in my makeup cabinet, it still comes out. It’s super fragranced but it goes away quick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. I love how I can use it for touch-ups for on the go. I also love how long lasting this stick foundation is. It has such a nice calming smell to it. Definitely worth having, and the packaging is beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is chefs kiss with a glowy smooth finish. Feels hydrating when applying, and the packaging is the definition of CLASS. Unfortunately this was not my shade, but I would repurchase in my shade for sure! Sleek design is also good for travel and touch ups. Overall, big fan. Summer months I used as more of a brighting concealer, maybe this shade will fit my winter skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: one of the best makeup bases with a great finish it covers a lot of imperfections it doesn't feel greasy my pasty so it makes your makeup look beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hey loves and welcome. I’m a little late getting this out, it was LAFW!! I was sent the dupe Skin Perfect foundation but my shade wasn’t available, so I chose one for bronzer. It’s too deep, but it worked out. I got shade 8n and the finish is flawless. I like the way it need with my backstage foundation in shade 2WO and concealer in 1N. My makeup always turns out nice when I use this but later it oxidizes and the bronzer makes my face look darker. I love it still!! The foundation is beautiful and I’d high recommend it to anyone. My sister wears 5wo/5n, I’ll give it to her and see if it works! Thanks so much🙏🏼❤️‍🔥💕

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of stick foundations, and I was looking forward to this one. This is a nice foundation, but I didn't get a shade that matched me. I received the second lightest shade; it oxidized incredibly peachy and was too dark for my skin tone. The formula is nice and creamy, but the shade range is minimal.   It blends nicely, and the finish is more satin. I had to mix mine and sheer it to make it work. It's also very pricy for the small amount, but that's to be expended with luxury brands. Maybe I would have had better results if I had gotten a lighter shade. Overall, if you're in the market for a Lux Stick foundation, this is pretty on par with others.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 W Warm - very light skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So good I bought it twice   Just do it love love love     Love loveLove

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, not only does it smell amazing but it leaves the most beautiful finish on the skin. It feels light on the skin but has amazing coverage. It does take a little finesse to blend but once you get the hang of it nothing beats it. The packaging is super luxurious and makes it so easy to swipe on and blend. I love this!!

reviews.review_title: It gives me such a natural glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical of the Dior foundation stick at first because I thought the color wouldn’t match my skin tone. I actually love it. It blended soooo well. It literally looks like I am wearing my natural skin and it gives me a glow. The packaging was nice. It actually has a little fragrance scent which smells really good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately for my bank account, I really like this product. I was originally going to buy the merit complexion stick but I decided to try the tester out of this product in store and I was immediately wowed with the color match, butter like glide of the product (especially for a tester that's sat out), and the blurring upon blending. I'm pretty oily and foundation tends to separate towards the end of the day, but this one is surprisingly hardy (not perfect, but I'm veryyyy oily). I pair this with the danessa myricks translucent blurring balm powder and blend it out with the dense saie buffing brush and my skin looks phenomenal and like I'm not wearing anything. Usually I'd dock a star for price, but sometimes you actually are paying for what you get and complexion products are worth splurging on imo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion/review. As soon as I swatched this foundation stick on my arm, I instantly fell in love. The buttery soft smooth glide was a turn-on. I use this stick for contouring. Upon first glance, foundation looks a tiny bit shimmery. However, once applied, my face appeared to look naturally youthful and dewy. Glides on thick, but in a good way where product isn't wasted yet can be used for full to light coverage looks. It stays wherever it's placed. Last all day and night. Doesn't give cakey. Very impressive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this for about a month. Loved it at first - nice coverage. But it is so drying. Not good at all for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the packaging of this stick foundation - you can twist it up and then back down again which is convenient. The coverage is buildable, but a little drying. Make sure you use a very hydrating moisturizer before applying. It lasts pretty well throughout the day.  It does have a strong ‘makeup’ scent that is a little off putting but it doesn’t sit on the skin too long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gave this product to my mother, and she loved it. She used it to do her makeup for a wedding. People gave her lots of compliments. It's easy to used and it is nice be a chinny on her cheeks .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! It smells amazing and glides on great! It has great coverage and is light and airy! Definitely blends with any concealer too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was impressed how smooth this glides on and the formula is so creamy. It can be used as foundation or contouring. This even lasted in the extreme summer heat. This doesn’t dry out your skin and the foundation is buildable. Overall, I loved it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so great and versatile. It glides on so smooth and it stays!! It has a great range of shades for everyone as well. It gives medium to full coverage. It’s perfect travel size too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. For starters, I accidentally picked out the wrong shade. I am very fair complected and I usually have to order the lightest shade in most makeup products but this one was actually a little too light for a skin tone and makes me look a little more ghostly than usual. I do appreciate a line that offers a wide range in terms of skin tones though because finding shades that aren’t too dark for me can be really challenging. That being said, the foundation is very buildable and provides decent coverage to the face. It is easy to use and blends fairly well. It does leave the skin on my face feeling a little weird. In some areas my skin ends up being a bit dry and in other areas, I think my skin tends to get more oily. The makeup doesn’t really set well either so I wouldn’t say that it is as long lasting as some of the other makeup products I’ve used in the past. I’m not a huge fan of the fact the product is scented either but at least it is a subtle, pleasant scent. Overall, it’s decent but I’m undecided on whether I would want to buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is worth every penny! I have combination and mature skin and it sits beautifully on my skin and lasts all day! I will definitely be repurchasing! It feels like there is nothing on my face!!  It does have a fragrance but once applied you don’t smell it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This multi-usage stick is smooth like butter. It just glides in your skin! I love the way Dior’s products smell! Worth the price! It is super pigmented and ur has a 23hr hydration. I have used it  in the summer as an all over foundation but do prefer to use it as a contour stick. The color is a little too dark for me! You get a decent amount in the stick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!  It glides on smooth and stays on well.  It doesn't cake and makes my face look dewy. I've used similar products from Makeup Forever, Tarte, and Merit.  I use foundation sticks daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it  I was in shock for the perfect shade  Is like you don’t have makeup on but at the same time all the imperfections are blurred 😍😍😍is the first time a high end makeup brand had me in speechless   time    time a big Is the

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 0 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What is this sorcery, it looks so natural and good and doesn't crease AT ALL or break apart around my oily nose at the end of the day ???  and that's with no primer, only hydrated skin. 🫡🫡🫡

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is fairly lightweight and a natural medium finish. It gives such a beautiful blurred soft matte canvas. Great for combo skin. The shade match was comparable to the other shades in the line. Unfortunately, this product is fragranced. Blend ability is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: “I received these products for free from influenster and brand (s) in exchange for my honest review”. It has a light essence and feels creamy. You can do medium to full coverage. It is perfect for dry skin. I recommend it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation is amazing! It offers full coverage with a lightweight feel that lasts all day. It blends seamlessly for a natural, flawless finish and controls oil and shine. The extensive shade range made it easy to find my perfect match. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_title: Glides on soooo easily. Light coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion.  This foundation has several qualities that I love! A few of my favorites include the range of shades, the ease of application, the portability of stick, and the way this foundation spreads is amazing! I even think it has a decent scent. I have not tried to build it however. Once coat gives a nice natural yet smooth look. It is not caked or hard to apply in small areas! I definitely recommend this for a light coverage maybe medium coverage! A new favorite for me!

reviews.review_title: hard to tell since it’s not my shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot accurately review this since it is significantly darker than my skin tone but it smells really good and the stick packaging seems perfect for on the go! Also looks very pigmented!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review the shade is a bit darker but its okay the foundation has a great coverage and super love the light scent will recommend this product to my friends and family!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t sure if I was going to like this foundation stick or not. But I instantly fell in love with it!! I’m not huge on fragrance in my foundation but this smells lightly of perfume, a very luxurious scent. It blends flawlessly and doesn’t cake up on my face! I wore it all day without having to reapply and it held up perfectly! Big applause to Dior for this product it’s great!!

reviews.review_title: Glides very smoothly, even on dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
