reviews.review_text: I’m very impressed with this foundation! For a stick formula, it glides very smoothly on my dry skin and provides good coverage. I accidentally picked a shade that was too dark for me, so it’s hard to tell if it truly does oxidize or not, but I’m not considering that apart of the review since it’s my fault. This really does have good coverage for a stick foundation, and it makes it very easy to travel with. The packaging seems like it wouldn’t break the foundation while traveling either. I would recommend this foundation with a setting powder, as it looked a bit too shiny by itself for my liking, however, if you love that this would be great. I’m impressed with how easy it glides, as usually stick foundations are terrible for dry skin. I’m going to get this in a lighter shade, I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Flawless. Skin looks like silk. I have never tried a foundation i love more than this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t wear foundation but I was intrigued after seeing so many positive reviews and seeing how it sat on other peoples skin. Immediately impressed. Blends like butter, is definitely blurring. Doesn’t feel like anything on the skin. Plays well with my other products. Looks like skin, feels like skin. I just wish for the price, we were given a half ounce. And wish there was a larger shade range for my deep girlies.  But would buy again.

reviews.review_title: DIOR Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am thoroughly impressed by the DIOR Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick. I was fortunate to receive this product as a gift in exchange for my honest opinion, and I'm so glad I was given the opportunity because, as someone who usually dislikes foundation sticks, this one has won me over! I never thought a foundation stick could be so useful. I normally prefer liquid foundation, believing it was the only way to achieve a flawless finish. However, I am blown away by how creamy and flawless the application of this foundation stick is. It effortlessly melts into your skin and provides the most perfect coverage! I was also surprised at how well the shade matched my skin tone and stayed put throughout the day. It really gives the skin a perfect, natural, healthy glow and has a beautiful smell  .I'm genuinely obsessed at this point! I also love how compact and cute the stick is, especially because I carry mini bags and like to have my makeup essentials with me. This foundation stick is just perfect for me. Love this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful, creamy foundation that blends like a dream. It feels so light on the skin upon application and lasts all day. It’s got medium to full coverage finish. This is perfect for those who want a no mess application of foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s Dior so definitely worth the high price you will pay for it and mind it the coverage is fab and shade blends within seconds what a texture I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very full coverage and thick. If you are someone who likes the look of foundation and doesn’t mind looking cakey, this could be for you. It is creamy and blends well. You could definitely want to set this with a powder and setting spray. I like more of a natural looking foundation, so this isn’t a favorite of mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite new makeup item. I love this stuff it is such a creamy and smooth concealer and I need very little to be able to blur any pores or other areas where I may need additional coverage. The color is almost a perfect match and the swatch per the picture was very true to life which was helpful and it's good to know for the future too! This is also a very buildable coverage, although I didn't need much and often just used this under my eyes, i did not need a lot to cover up the darker circles. Would absolutely purchase again!

reviews.review_title: In 45 years I've never loved a skin product more!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a medical aesthetician and makeup artist for over 20 years. I have collected a graveyard of failed foundations. This product will absolutely NOT be joining that club. I can confidently say that in all my years, I have never enjoyed anything more than this on my skin.  For context, I'm 45 with newly combination skin, dry patches and a fair amount of redness. A single layer creates a beautiful canvas throughout the various zones. My skin feels like silk and there's absolutely zero caking, settling or heaviness. Beyond that, the wear is stellar, my oily areas seem matte, and the dry areas are unnoticeable. I'm blown away.  There is a perfume that is notable from the product but even though I am rather sensitive, I do not have a reaction nor notice it after application. It blends effortlessly and makes my skin seem flawless. I absolutely recommend this for anyone currently struggling to homogenize tricky skin without feeling like they've put on a mask. I'm going back today to pick up the contour sticks.   Love, love, love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation! Creases without proper skin prep but coverage is wonderful. Would recommend.

reviews.review_title: If you have to Zoom a lot, you need this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is pretty good in person. Good coverage and all of that. But the magic is when I have to jump on Zoom for whatever meetings. I don’t know what magic is in there but my skin looks incredible with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used a lot of stick foundations before and I love how smooth and easy they are to apply. It’s so easy to control how much product you use compared to any liquid foundation. I also felt like the shade color itself was pretty true to the packaging and matched my skin tone. Unfortunately the product itself is not great for oily skin. I felt like it started to breakdown, especially around my nose, after only a couple hours compared to the normal liquid foundation I use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks beautiful and is the only brand that has my shade match at Sephora.

reviews.review_title: Not for us dry skin girls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this! I’ve been looking for a stick foundation to replace the one that Benefit discontinued years ago that I loved, and this one is all the rage right now but sadly it doesn’t work on my mature, alligator dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so nice. I don't usually use foundation but it was easy to apply and my skin had a very nice finish with no crusty spots as when I usually use foundation.it blurred my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a beautiful finish! Not too matte, not too dewy. I stroked on my skin and blended with a brush. Lasted all day and came off easy with my usual cleanser. Superb.

reviews.review_title: not the best for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it applies and blends out beautifully. it is full coverage without looking too heavy. i loved how it looked on...for the first 30 minutes. after that, it gets increasingly shiny on me. I even set it with powder and after 5 hours, I was so oily looking and I could see the foundation breaking down. it doesnt set on its own and even with powder, it transfered when I touched it. i didn't  love the scent but i like that it dissipates quickly and that it didn't break me out. it's also really expensive for how much product you get. it only has 3/4 of an inch of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very creamy but not for my dry skin.. it made me look makeupy. i would recommend it to someone with normal and combination skin.

reviews.review_title: Perfect to use in a rush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage! I got a shade darker but it’s my fault. It blended out so effortlessly as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage out of this product! Need a sticky primer to keep it in place but overall very good color and a very good foundation. Will stay on all day with a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always been a fan of stick foundations for their ease of use but this one is definitely exceptional!! This foundation has such a beautiful coverage! I love the finish!! And it blends like a dream…11/10

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 W Warm - very light skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t like the scent. It’s way too strong and stays with me all day. The coverage, application, and formula are all really nice, though. I wouldn’t recommend if you’re sensitive to smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This is truly amazing. Glides onto skin so effortlessly and gives the most beautiful, blurring but natural finish. Definitely buildable. I actually love the light scent. Did a nursing 14 hour work day, and it still looked amazing after my shift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty and elegant packaging. Smooth and easy to apply.  The shade I received is a bit lighter than my skin color, but I still used it to be able to review. It evens out easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is beautiful. I bought this morning in shade 2N. So far I am loving it. It looks flawless on the skin, blends like a dream and very skin like as well. The fragrance is light, i actually enjoy the smell.

reviews.review_title: Holy SMOKES!! Over 50, here's the one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy Cr***. Never liked sticks, but this is AMAZING especially for older skin. Applies smooth and velvety,  not drying.  Has a slight fragrance I don't care for but will try to see if breaks me out. Currently,  top 3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by saying that I had never tried a luxury brand foundation before.This forever skin perfect Dior stick foundation. It has been heavenly. The shade is perfect, it blends divinely. I am obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mine came slighly darker than my shade and with the product stuck on the cap, but I managed to put it back and use it. The packaging is pretty plain but cute/fancy. Very easy to blend out, pretty smooth glide and looks a little bit blurring on the skin. Skin like appereance , medium to full coverage, slight fragance, very subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage with an extremely smooth finish. This Dior foundation stick blends incredibly well and applies easily to the skin. It also smells heavenly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color match was on point. Foundation started flaking after less than 2 hours of wear. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful coverage, buildable and makes me feel flawless. I really enjoy the Dior foundation products. Lasts all day and the foundation stick is easy to use, easy for travel, and great coverage! I highly recommend this product and will be buying this again.

reviews.review_title: SO IN LOVE, Truly a must-have in your maquillage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently discovered Dior’s multi-use foundation stick and I must say, I am absolutely in love with it! After using the forever skin glow foundation for a while, I decided to give this a try, and I was amazed by how beautifully it goes on. It truly makes your skin look flawless. When paired with my YSL primer, the results are just stunning! I have to say, this foundation stick has quickly become my Holy Grail product, and the fact that it comes at a great price is just the cherry on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is sleek and chic, very beautiful. It has a buttery soft finish. The coverage is buildable- you can use it as a full coverage foundation, or to contour or even just cover up little spots, so it’s like a three in one, making it a great value for the price. It blends super easily and feels light on my skin. The only downside is the color- I picked the wrong one by accident, one that showed as being for someone with very dark skin. But, it worked for me just fine. Granted, I’ve had a tan while using it, but in the future I wouldn’t want to pick a color based on the color matching chart online, because going off of that, the color I picked should’ve been way too dark. That’s the reason I gave four, not five stars. I added a picture of me wearing the makeup as well as the model shown on the chart for the shade I got for reference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was a good color match for me & looked very natural! It is very lightweight & buildable with other products. I like that it can easily be carried in my purse for on-the-go application & the packaging is very sleek & cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was perfect!! I used it to enhance my look for my maternity shoot and wow! I normally wouldn’t spend a lot of foundation but I think I’ll be order another one once this runs out. The coverage wasn’t heavy or oily! It sat on my skin well and when I got hot, it glistened but didn’t smear which was great! The shade itself could have been a bit better but overall it matched enough for it to work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ummm first impressions, this is absolutely stunning! It is fragranced though, so beware if you can get past the scent, you will love this. It gives a beautiful coverage and is very blend-able.  I hope it wears well too!

reviews.review_title: The best stick foundation I have ever used!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is the best formula in a stick I have ever used! It goes on so smooth and you only need a little bit to get a great amount of Coverage! I only gave 4 stars because this colors not a 100% match for me however it was my perfect summer shade!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a wonderful foundation. Medium builds me coverage, smells sooooo luxurious, not heavy on the skin and blends out like a dream.  Sometimes I use it as all over foundation, other times I use it as just concealer. Works both ways!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Of course the coverage is amazing, the fact that it is a stick product that I can keep in my bag for easy touch ups on the go is wonderful. So portable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The most glam and luxurious foundation I’ve ever used. I get compliments on this daily. It’s easy to apply and super blendable. I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great contour stick. Beautiful texture and blended well. Long lasting. Great coverage that is buildable. Beautiful classy packaging. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Application is easy…I love this foundation It's definitely my favorite,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible shade range for fair skin. They are either too orange or pale. It felt okay but since the shade was way off I couldn’t rlly try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation it’s very full coverage it looks very good on the skin it feels light weight and perfect and overall it’s one of the best I’ve ever tried

I will say this changed my mind about stick foundations. It is more of a natural looking finish as opposed to flat matte and it blends well. It had a scent if you don’t scented products this isn’t for you. It’s a good foundation.

reviews.review_title: Must-Have Foundation for a Glowy, Perfect Finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE Dior’s new Forever Skin Perfect foundation stick. The packaging is portable and sleek, making it great for an on-the-go makeup product. And the product itself is just the best - the formula is thick and creamy, providing a medium to full coverage that is buildable and blends out like a dream.  I love using this product in conjunction with other CC creams or liquid foundations, giving me a flawless finish and a satin-y, slightly dewy glow. Also perfect to use as a contour stick to really highlight the areas that you want to stand out. Overall, 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this new Forever Skin Perfect foundation from Dior and Influenster to try for my honest review. The foundation is in the stick and holds a form, so the consistence is dryer on my skin than liquid foundation, but the oil in it let it blends quickly. I love the stick, it’s beautiful, compact, and easy to carry with you anywhere. I would say it has more matte or natural finish and you skin won’t glisten for sure. The foundation makes skin more even 100 percent, but I think it needs stronger concealer formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula of this product! It melts into the skin so easily and leaves a beautiful finish. Super easy to stay clean since it’s in stick form so it’s perfect to keep with me for touch ups throughout the day. I’d say it’s a buildable medium coverage.

reviews.review_title: my makeup routine so much easier!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is flawless, giving me an even, natural look without feeling heavy. I also love the sleek, luxurious packaging—it feels high-end. The finish leaves my skin with a radiant glow, and the light scent is a perfect touch. It blends seamlessly, making my makeup routine so much easier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very blendable, and has good coverage! I definitely would recommend a primer before hand with this product as it does seep into the pores of your face lol

reviews.review_title: Beautiful medium coverage with skin-like finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Product provided beautiful medium coverage and left a skin like, radiant finish. Dark circles and minor blemishes vanished. My only issue with the product was oxidation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation stick! I usually only use CC cream because I don’t like foundation. However, this foundation stick is a game changer. It goes on smooth and is not cakey at all. It also lasts all day. I went to Las Vegas and walked in the hot sun in the middle of summer and it still looked great in the evening time after that! It also does not show your pores at all. It goes on smooth and stays. It’s also easy to blend with a bronzer stick or liquid blush (and regular powder blush and bronzer, too!). Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t able to get the tester in my shade but I used this shade as a contour and I love it! So creamy and melts into the skin, perfect for blending. I can’t wait to get it in my shade to try it for my foundation. I also LOVE the packaging! It’s so durable and the twist-up design is so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I would give it 5 stars but it has a fragrance that’s not needed at all. But it is very smooth like velvet and blendable and easy to apply. Not sure it’s my favorite on my face it does feel a little heavy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Influenster. It really enjoyed the finish on this foundation. It had great medium coverage but could be built up with a nice satin finish. The shade I received was a little dark for me so I’ll have to buy a lighter shade as we leave summer.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ended up picking out a shade too warm and deep, so instead of trying it as a foundation I used it as a bronzer and it was perfect. I can apply it directly over foundation and it blends out seamlessly without disturbing the rest of my makeup. I would say this is a medium buildable coverage with a satin/natural finish. I prefer blending it with a brush for more coverage but a sponge works just as good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this foundation quite a bit, but didn’t love it. The packaging is great and I overall like the formula, but I was very aware of the fact that I was wearing foundation throughout the day. The color match on this is spot on, and it blends pretty well! I also like that it is quite buildable, so you can decide the coverage level for you. Solid stick foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dior’s 1.5N foundation stick shade‭ is a light-skin, warm-toned neutral.‬ I found that it pulled slightly warmer and darker than i would have expected on me.   I usually wear a Glossier g11 in the concealer or an Anastasia Beverly Hills shade 3 in the beauty balm. I wouldn’t say that it was an exact color match for me.    ‭The undertone of 1.5N leans towards a yellow or warm-toned ‬undertone. I was surprised to see that it swatched lighter on me than the 1N shade.  The foundation sticks have a medium consistency that builds up to full coverage pretty much immediately. If you have dry skin, my recommendation is to not apply too much and keep it really light in coverage.   To get a natural look: moisturize beforehand to minimize any texture from dry skin. Place a couple of lightly applied dots across your T-Zone and any red areas before blending out with a sponge. Finish with hyaluronic setting spray. When using this foundation stick I would advise that less is more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item for free for my honest review. Color matching was off. This shade was darker than pictured. However, it works as a contour stick. Blends in well with a blender sponge. Would like to try in my correct shade for my entire face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shade Name: ‭1 N‬ ‭Neutral – Very light with neutral undertones.‬   Actual Shade: ‭Closer to a light-tan, cool-toned neutral. This is not a fair or lighter skin ‬shade and it does not directly correspond to what is typically expected from a 1N shade in other brands. For reference, I usually wear a Glossier G11 or a Make Up For Ever Y225 and this shade is NOT a color match for those.   ‭ Undertone: Shade 1 leans towards a peachy undertone with cool-‬toned elements.   ‭ Color Depth: Despite expectations based on numbering, ‬Shade 1N appears to be a darker shade than 1.5N due to its undertone. This shade may be better suited for someone with the lightest “tan” skin tone because of its deeper, peachy hue.‭ I would ‬say that Dior’s 1N may reach up to 2.5x darker than your average 1N shade.    ‭Swatch Recommendation: ‬  - ‭The product looks different on the skin than how it appears in the ‬tube. - ‭Swatch in person. Test on your face and neck, not your just on ‬your wrist or hand. Test on spots of redness and on your T-Zone to know for sure if a cool-toned neutral is right for you. Compare it against your neck to see if it looks too dark. - ‭Swatch directly on your neck if you struggle to see tone ‬differences in various lighting situations.   Consistency: The Dior foundation sticks are of a medium to thick consistency, yet are still soft, creamy, and ultra-blendable.   Scent:  The foundation has a subtle scent of blooming iris flowers that I found to be very refreshing and pleasant. I personally love that they’re scented, as it adds that extra luxurious touch that you don’t often see brands bother with. My combo-dry skin didn’t experience any sensitivity or irritation from the added scent ingredients.   Full coverage: These foundation sticks are marketed as buildable to full coverage, but I personally found that it’s too easy to reach that full-coverage point and end up accidentally applying too much product onto the skin. (Don’t draw lines, just blend out a few dots!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product has nice coverage but can sit a bit too heavy on my skin. This neutral shade leans a bit too pink for my neutral undertone. The foundation also has a light floral scent

reviews.review_title: A must have! It’s just beautiful!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick is the most blurring I have had! I have used and purchased a lot of foundations and this one is BY FAR the best one I have used! I totally recommend this (purchased with my own money and not sponsored)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stick foundation is delightful.  The stick formula is not too heavy and blends out nicely.  There is a slight floral fragrance which is pleasant enough.  I would say this is lighter coverage foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula of this is so creamy and glides on your skin like a dream. I usually use liquid foundation, so I was pleasantly surprised that I actually preferred using the cream. Unlike liquids this doesn’t dry or crease-it almost feels like a balm with a smoothing texture. I’ve been seeing the sculpting sticks everywhere from Dior, so I was so happy that the foundation seems to work as well as them! 100% switching out my old foundation for this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i really do like it- super good coverage but the texture felt a little off. heavy and oily. especially noticeable if you smudge any on the tube itself… so oily it will NOT come off the tube. otherwise really effective and blendable. thanks for the complimentary item in exchange for review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dior foundation texture is sooo soft and smooth on my skin. The coverage is amazing  for all the day.i like the packaging , make it easy to apply . Smell good i definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay… this is a life changing for me, it have a medium cover it leaves my face looking flawless, the best is the fragrance! It smells so good! The stick is great so easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite foundation! I love how light it feels while providing great coverage ! The makeup stays all day and doesn’t move ! I would definitely recommend this product but take extra steps with prepping if you have oily skin. I love the sleek and luxurious packaging so much, thank you Dior & influenster

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a buildable coverage matte foundation. I use this on days or nights for a more full glam and put product on my hand and apply with a brush. There is a strong scent, however it is worth it for how great it looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very creamy and blendable. I like the stick form, very easy to use and travel with. I like this product. I don’t love it because it’s not for dry skin. If you have combination skin this will be perfect . Shade I got is too light but the coverage is good as a concealer. This product is very pigmented and full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick blends in smoothly to the skin giving. It looks like I'm not wearing make up and it is lightweight. It's a buildable matte foundation. I also like that it can also be used  as a concealer or for touch ups as well. It's a good foundation to use during the hot days because it doesn't make me look shiny and it's long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color match is definitely good I love how pale and truly pale, no yellow tint, the range goes (which is what I used as I get really pale in the winter). It did immediately cling to my pores but after blending in was okay. My skin dryness did kind or show more. But it does have a strong scent.

reviews.review_title: Definitely making it's way into my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super versatile product, you can use it for a full face, spot concealing, or touch ups. It has a really natural, blurred skin finish so it looks really undetectable on. A little bit goes a long way so keep that in mind when applying. This is advertised as hydrating, which I agree with, but that also means it is best to set with powder to keep it in place all day. I would recommend this especially if you're looking for a quick and easy product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me first start off with saying this review is based on my combination sensitive skin. I’ll start off with packaging, it’s luxurious and perfect when on the go. This foundation stick glides on smooth, is very pigmented with great coverage. The only downside for me is the parfum scent it has, I prefer non-scented makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love using this product! the consistency is nice and creates a great end result! i use this product in my daily routine and i would not change it for anything! i will definitely keep repurchasing in the future when my stash runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect multi-use foundation stick claims to deliver a natural, blurred finish with buildable coverage and 24-hour wear.  Dior is a staple in my makeup collection so I was extremely excited to test out this new product! Packaging is so lux and smell is divine (per usual). Upon initial application I was surprised because it felt so heavy. I have large pores on my nose with combo skin and this foundation didn’t do me any favors… it sank into my pores while also weirdly sitting on other parts of my face. Most of it slipped off my face after a few hours of wear. I thought it might’ve been my skincare so tried it multiple times with various products.  In short, I had the best results when I used a gripping primer followed by a pore filling primer and used a dense brush.  I’d say the coverage is buildable with a natural, radiant leaning finish. With proper priming and setting it does withstand the Texas heat!  Do I recommend it- depends… if you’re looking for an aesthetic makeup product to display on your vanity- yes! For me, I probably stick to my other Dior products. I just feel that for the price I shouldn’t have to try so hard to make it work. Not a bad product, just not for me.   *this product was sent to me by Influenster in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. I love how beautifully it applies to my mature skin and doesn't accentuate lines and wrinkles. The shade range could be a little better, but overall it's not a bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What an impressive product. I was thrilled to try this and wasn’t disappointed. The coverage is customizable and flawless. I love the ease of application. It smells so freaking good too! I would recommend if in your price range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation - the finish (radiant but now too glowy), texture (creamy), the coverage (it covers but it’s not too full), the skin toning (it’s snatches you), etc is perfect! I don’t usually like stick foundations because I feel like they sit on the skin funny. But this is PERFECTION! My new favorite foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a foundation stick to take along when I travel. This is perfect! It covers well and has such a smooth finish. The shade was darker than what was depicted online, but I am able to balance it out with a lighter concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this new foundation stick from Dior! The foundation is deliciously creamy and has such a lovely subtle scent. It goes on very easily and is really great quality, which can be expected from Dior!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay this formulation is amazing. Great coverage without feeling cakey. I usually am hesitant with foundation sticks because they tend to feel heavy for me. This product was light and was very easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this had great coverage and it left and flawless finish. it was easy to blend and i loved the packaging. very on brand and the smell was natural. love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this dior stick foundation is so creamy and blendable. it is one of the best foundations (liquid or cream) ive ever used. incredible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from @Influenster and @Dior for review purposes.   I am super impressed with the @Dior Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation in 2CR Cool Rosey. I finally found the perfect foundation stick in My correct shade that is durable, long wearing, blends effortlessly and looks flawless on My skin!   The Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation is a remarkable, hydrating foundation that blends seamlessly and effortlessly into the skin, without making My face look cakey! The soft, lightweight, skincare-hybrid foundation has a beautiful, your skin but better blurring filter effect, which minimizes the look of pores, conceals imperfections, evens out My complexion and delivers a flawless natural finish!   I really appreciate that the multi-purpose foundation is long wearing, doesn’t feel heavy, doesn’t melt away or make Me look cakey! I highly recommend this foundation/concealer and I would re-purchase this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this, but it felt very heavy on the skin. I have combo skin and I usually prep very well. This never felt like it sat well on top of my skincare. The color was slightly orange on me. It also has a strong fragrance. It’s not a bad product, just not for me!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Forever skin perfect by Dior is perfect for my skin. It glides on so smoothly blends in well. The coverage is great and the finish is dewy yet has an almost matte finish. I love how it makes my skin feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product had a good, light coverage. It has so many shade options too. It did crease and crack for me at my chin and nose corners which I didn’t love. But it did blend well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never been a fan of stick foundations because they make me think of a greasy or heavy feeling but that’s definitely not the case with this one. I love this foundation and will definitely be repurchasing, it’s so blurring and it checks all the boxes for me. I was looking for light weight, non greasy, light coverage and skin-like. This has it all. Now if you don’t like fragrance, this won’t be for you but that goes for any Dior foundation and this wouldn’t be good for dry skin. I had a few acne spots that I dried out and it clung to it a little bit. Also for reference I have sensitive, acne prone skin with an oily tzone. I have no issues with oil control while wearing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite foundation. This was my first time trying a foundation stick, and I will never go back. The application is super simple. Just rub some on your face and blend it in with a beauty blender. It leaves my face looking flawless with all day full coverage. Even my face oils can’t ruin this foundation! Plus there are many shades to choose from so you should be able to find a perfect shade for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this foundation. It is very buildable, so you can choose either light coverage or full coverage with amount of swipes across the face or a damp beauty blender versus a makeup brush.  Coverage lasted all day with a light powder like finish. It is strongly perfumed, so it is definitely not for those sensitive to fragrance. The packaging doesn’t just look good, it’s durable and great to throw in your bag on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by saying that I had never tried a luxury brand foundation before.This forever skin perfect Dior stick foundation. It has been heavenly. The shade is perfect, it blends divinely. I am obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy this product makes applying foundation. I love how the coverage is pretty good as it does hide blemishes since it is medium coverage. The packaging is simple but luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Easy to blend out with buildable coverage. Has a gorgeous finish, looks very skinlike.   Cons: The wear on this is not longwearing at all. It is longer than other natural finish foundations I own, but pales in comparison to my matte foundations. I can get about 3 hours before my oils start to poke through. If this was not marketed as long wear I'd rate it higher. I usually reach for it for a dinner out in the evening.   If you are balanced, you'll probably REALLY enjoy this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This beats Tom Ford stick foundation hands down. Incredibly blendable, blurring and soft finish. This is the best Dior foundation since their airflash, which they discontinued.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 W Warm - very light skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

It’s a little expensive, but the price is similar to other foundation sticks like the Ilia. The only thing I don’t like is the strong perfume and that the packaging doesn’t seem sturdy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Pretty good if you want something high end

It's nice and blendable. There's not a ton of product, so I'd love a refill option for this since tossing the component seems wasteful. If you like luxury makeup and have been looking for a stick foundation, this is a nice one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation from Dior wears super nice on the skin. I love the way it evens out my skin tone without looking cakey. It also doesn’t feel heavy so I barely notice I’m wearing foundation at all! I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It blends in my skin perfectly is also moisturizing recommend this product. The shade is amazing and the packaging is so nice and sleek.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 CR Cool Rosy - very light skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was wayyyyyyy to light for me so I gifted it to a fellow light skinned frannnn and she’s OBSESSED. She says it’s lightweight and not heavy like you would think just feeling it for the first time. She recommends!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is SO good. It truly replaced all my other foundations I barely pick anything else up anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is beautiful and heavy duty - definitely feels expensive! I think that this color was a little off for my skin tone (but that’s my fault for selecting the wrong color). Overall, I liked the product… but it wouldn’t be my day to day all day wear. The product looks great for the first few hours, but by the end of the day I found that my skin was getting oily and the product was clumping. I don’t usually have this issue so not a product I’d reach for if I need it to last all day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 CR Cool Rosy - very light skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been on the hunt for a foundation that not only gives me flawless coverage but also feels comfortable enough for all-day wear, and I think I’ve found the one in Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation! From the moment I applied it, I was impressed by how smoothly it glides on the skin, blending effortlessly and leaving behind a natural, radiant finish.  The formula feels so lightweight yet provides the perfect amount of coverage to even out my complexion without looking cakey or feeling heavy. I love that it stays put throughout the day, especially in humid conditions, and I don’t need to worry about constant touch-ups. The long-lasting matte finish is perfect for my combination skin, keeping shine under control while still looking fresh and hydrated. Plus, it’s great to know it has skincare benefits built in—my skin feels smoother and healthier after using it regularly.  This foundation has quickly become a staple in my beauty routine. Whether I’m going for a soft everyday look or need something a little more glam, Dior Forever Skin Perfect has me covered (literally!). Highly recommend this to anyone looking for a luxurious foundation that delivers on its promises!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 0 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love stick type foundation because it’s so convenient and easy to blend. It also doesn’t leave a wet or sticky residue. The only complaint with this product is the scent. I use unscented products and this one is a little too scented for me. It did not break out my skin though which is nice. Overall coverage and blendability is good, I just prefer unscented!

reviews.review_title: Very creamy easy to use foundation stick

I have very dry skin and although the formula is really creamy it is a little drying for my skin. It does have a scent but not over powering. This foundation match was great, overall I liked this foundation stick

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 CR Cool Rosy - very light skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
