I love the texture because it glides across my face smoothly without being too drying/ cakey. I have the shade 1CR, and it’s the perfect shade for me! I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is soooo beautiful! The stick itself goes on super creamy and then turns matte. I do not use a powder with it, so it does transfer a tiny bit if I wipe my face with my hand. It has a super natural finish and the shade match is so lovely! I love layering my other products over it because they blend so beautifully. This is a lovely foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first time trying out Christian Dior cosmetics and I was very impressed with the quality. It is smooth and very easy to apply, and it blends nicely on the skin. I applied it with a brush and then finished it with a beauty blender. It smells clean and the packaging is great, because it rotates upwards as you consume it. I wish it was closer to my color but I highly recommend if you’re looking for something more full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous foundation product! Goes on so smooth and blends like a dream. It has a very natural finish and buildable medium coverage. Very light weight but seamless coverage. Packaging is easy to use and travel friendly. Stays on without getting cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was much better than I expected. I love how well the shade matched my skin. It’s also has a very nice coverage with just one swipe too. I love the packaging because it is super convenient and you can throw it into your purse instead of a full bottle of foundation. The smell is a tad bit strong so I wish it was more toned down but outside of that I love it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 0 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m simply in love with this foundation! The coverage is amazing and the color is perfect! You could use with no powder that the finish would still be perfect! Blends perfectly on skin and the packaging is super easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent the wrong shade so I cannot speak on the shade. but. the formula is super smooth and nice and it blends out so beautifully. I love the packaging. it’s simple but pretty and looks expensive.

C’est un excellent produit pour peau mature.  J’ai 56 ans et j’utilise le fond de teint pour unifier mon teint et cacher des imperfections a certains endroits et pour réduire l’apparence des pores. J’estompe le produit avec mes doigts et c est très efficace,  c est invisible même si je n’en met pas partout sur mon visage. Je recommande ce produit sans hésiter!!porJ’estompe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never tried a foundation stick before let alone a high end one. The packaging is simple and luxe, it’s on the heavier side and it snaps closed. As with high end products, this does have a scent which fades once you put it on but I still think it’s unnecessary to have scented makeup. The formula itself is easy to spread, but it is slightly thick. I could tell right away that it was not the best color match but that doesn’t affect my opinion. Blending it out was fine and the coverage is a little more than sheer. I applied it a couple of different ways both times straight on to the skin with the stick but I tried once to blend with my sponge and then with a brush. The time with the sponge looked a little better blended out than with a brush. I wore this three times, once without primer, once with primer & again without. On my skin, it lasted a good 6 hours without the primer, as I usually wear face makeup without it, before it started to look a little cakey. With primer, it seemed to stay a little more but not much. Everyone’s skin is different so your mileage may vary there. Overall, I don’t think this converted me into a stick foundation person and it’s not a favorite, it’s just average. If you can test it in store, then it’s worth checking out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick went on so smooth and blended out seamlessly! It had great coverage and was easy to build. The package is very luxurious and the shade was perfect for me! I loved how flawless the finish was!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Medium buildable coverage, mess free stick, luxurious feeling packaging. Product lasts quite a while, can be manipulated to give a dewy or a matte finish. Blends well with fingers, brush or sponge. Felt nice on my normal to dry skin. I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was good and it felt nice. But it was a bit too orange toned for my skin and oxidized too tan. I think if it matched my skin shade I would have liked it more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful foundation! It glides on the skin very amootgly and beautifully and i love that it odesnt feel too cakey or heavy! Also, works wonderfull with other products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’d been looking for a foundation that provided medium coverage without looking heavy on my 50+ year old skin. This is perfection. Blends seamlessly, gives great coverage and lasts. A+

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many different foundations and this one is my absolute favorite. it blends so perfect. The packaging is so heavy duty. The coverage is perfect. And top it all off it smells wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. First of all if you’re sensitive to scent this may not be the product for you because it does have an artificial typical Dior product scent (but it fades really quickly). The coverage is great. Typically I’m only looking for a light cover and will do the stick very lightly and blend it in, but it would also be easy to lay on thicker if you’re looking for high-coverage. I’ve been noticing if I use it on top of my skincare routine it’s easy to have a Dewey finish, but I’ve also tried it when my skincare has been set and it leaves a more matte like finish. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never really used a foundation stick before but this was a little awkward to use because it was stiff and hard to blend. The coverage was fuller coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but I insisted that I need to let people know how gorgeous this looks on the skin! Do yourself a huge favor, splurge a little bit because you’ll be amazed at how beautiful this will make you look and feel!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. It has great buildable coverage that still looks natural with a dewy finish. It lasts all day long even without primer. It blends like a dream. Comes in a luxe packaging that is perfect for travelling since it doesn't take up much space. Obsessed! Definitely rebuying when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed! It is light coverage exactly how I like it! I love the scent of it and the packaging is so sleek. I have combination skin and it looks perfect on. I would definitely purchase again and recommend to all my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I had smooth skin I think it would've looked great but I have textured skin and it cracked around my problem areas. It was a bit difficult to blend but once I blended it out, it looked pretty good other than the patchy spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is BEAUTIFUL and I wish I could make it work. I was blown away the first time I applied it. The skin-like finish! The glow! The perfect coverage! The shade matched perfectly and it blended like a dream.   Unfortunately, FOR ME it did not last. I have very oily skin and this started to break down in a matter of hours. I’ve tried various primers, sprays, and setting powders, but I can never seem to get more than a few hours of wear before it starts slipping. I imagine this would be absolutely stunning if you have skin a little more normal/dry.   It’s still stunning and I’ll still wear it when I want to look good for a good time, not a long time. And who knows, maybe in winter it will work a little better for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is BEAUTIFUL and I wish I could make it work. I was blown away the first time I applied it. The skin-like finish! The glow! The perfect coverage! The shade matched perfectly and it blended like a dream.   Unfortunately, FOR ME it did not last. I have very oily skin and this started to break down in a matter of hours. I’ve tried various primers, sprays, and setting powders, but I can never seem to get more than a few hours of wear before it starts slipping. I imagine this would be absolutely stunning if you have skin a little more normal/dry.   It’s still stunning and I’ll still wear it when I want to look good for a good time, not a long time. And who knows, maybe in winter it will work a little better for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shade was perfect. It was light and soft on the skin. The fragrance was a little strong for me. It was easy to apply. It felt like powder on the skin. For me, the foundation was not hydrating enough. My face looked dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a great shade match for me, it blends beautifully, and it has nearly full coverage. It smells good (I don’t love that part of it though) and it does get cakey after a while, but overall I’m a fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation is a must have . It’s beautifully packaged in a tube that’s convenient to take when travel. I love the consistency of a stick formula because you can build the coverage .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this foundation stick! I’ll honestly usually just a tinted moisturizer girl but I like having the stick for days I want a little more coverage. The formula is light and goes on soo smooth. I just apply straight to my face then blend with my beauty blender. The smell is light and luxurious. I love the packaging and it is so easy to use on the go. I’m converted!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately the shade was not for me, but it was creamy and easy to blend. It has a smooth finish on the skin. I just wish it was the right shade for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely loving this foundation. I am 41 years old have dry/normal skin and this is just absolutely stunning. You wouldn’t believe it if I told you how many times I’ve tried a new foundation. Almost every time I’m disappointed, but I can honestly say for the first time in my life that this really blew me away. I absolutely recommend trying this if you’re interested I would say go ahead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Dior Foundation Stick for so many reasons. First and foremost, it blends beautifully with my skin, giving me a flawless finish. Whether I'm going for a matte look or something more dewy and hydrated, this foundation can do it all. It has incredible lasting power too, keeping my complexion looking fresh throughout the day without needing touch-ups.  However, I do have a major disappointment — the size of the foundation. At first glance, the packaging makes it seem like you're getting a lot of product, but once you twist it out, it’s clear that the amount inside is quite deceiving. There's far less foundation than you'd expect for the price, which is frustrating given how amazing the formula is. Dior, if you’re reading this, please consider giving us more product in the stick!

reviews.review_title: Okay if it was my shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick for free from Influenster and Dior in exchange for my honest opinion.  Sadly, I ended up getting a shade that didn’t match my complexion. The feel of the formula was great and it was blendable.  The texture is very smooth and it's easy to apply with a brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation gives great lightweight, sheer coverage. It's convenient to take along anywhere with its compact tube. My favorite part is the beautiful, floral scent. I have never had scented makeup before, and it adds such a fun and feminine touch! The foundation is creamy and easy to apply. I really like this overall. It stays on for most of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation! The finish is really smooth and blurring. The coverage is nice for my uneven tone. It is easy go blend and the packaging is compact.

reviews.review_title: I love the formula and scent! 🖤
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation stick complimentary from Influenster and Dior and really love the quality and formula! 🖤  I unfortunately chose the wrong color when picking, as usually instant claims go really fast and I thought it would be a match. The shade I got is really dark for my skin tone. It would be a shade that I could possibly wear during the summer if I am out in the sun a lot, as it matches my really tan skin. 🖤  This summer I was inside more so it was too dark for me. I did however do a few wear tests inside and really like the creamy formula, dreamy scent and how Dior Forever Skin Perfect wears on my dry, maturing skin. I have also used it as contour so that I don’t waste it and it’s worked really well as a contour for me. 🖤  I definitely will purchase this in a more idea shade. 🖤

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very smooth and easy to apply. It blends really well on my skin. The packaging is sleek and ideal for travel due to the smaller size. The foundation smells good, but the scent is strong for my liking. I typically prefer unscented products for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: An absolute breakthrough in foundation. Where to begin? The consistency is beautiful it applies like butter. It’s best to follow their instructions and lightly line the outside of the face and blend with a brush. A little bit goes such a long way and using too much takes away from its perfection. It has a lot of coverage and gives a gorgeous, etheric glow. The finish is similar to a rose petal, it’s amazing. It’s satin, doesn’t accentuate anything and lasts really well. The package is chic like always. The shade range is lovely. It’s been forever since a foundation has impressed me. Thank you Dior.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have a bunch of texture on my face but this covers pretty well. I used elf grip primer before. I only set a couple places with powder. The color is a little dark for me. I like the texture. It’s easy to blend. But it does kind of separate around my nose and in other places throughout the day including my chin and forehead. I do like this foundation and will continue to use it. I wouldn’t purchase it to use it again though..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This makeup foundation stick gives a great smooth,  weightless coverage. Doesn’t feel heavy. It matched my shade really well. Blends easily. The packaging was great as well. I would definitely purchase this item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade match is perfect and it applies so smoothly! It did come a bit oily when it was first opened and always has a bit of an oily residue on the rim. It blend perfectly with the rest of my everyday makeup routine!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a darker shade than my skin colo & have been using it as a contour stick! It works so well, the dior is designer & the quality definitely matches its cost & name.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 1000% YES! | had my makeup done by a MUA and she used Dior Foundation and I was in love. I tried this one and it went on super smooth, easy to blend, and has amazing coverage! I ended up getting it a little too light so l will use it as concealer, but I will definitely be finding a Dior Beauty to get color matched correctly (I picked this one by looking at shades online, which I'm rarely successful at, lol). I really do love this product. Oh, and the packaging is so sleek and just gives luxury! Im now a Dior foundation girly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So amazing! Great coverage and the finish is amazing! Packaging feels so luxurious and it feels great on my skin! Will definitely be buying again!

reviews.review_title: Nice foundation but needs a wider range of shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely fantastic packaging! The magnetic closure was a nice touch and made me confident that it wouldn't open up on my bag. Very nice full coverage foundation stick with a nice finish. I only have it 4 stars since I was disappointed to see the limited shade range, with very few options for darker skin tones.

reviews.review_title: Finally a stunning new stick cream foundation.  LO
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! LOVE!!! So beautiful, great coverage, beautiful application. This is my new go to foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very creamy and blendable. I like the stick form, very easy to use and travel with. Shade I got is too light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation delivers a flawless, long-lasting matte finish that feels lightweight on the skin. Its smooth, buildable coverage evens out complexion without feeling heavy, while offering hydration and a natural glow. Perfect for all-day wear, it’s ideal for those seeking a luxurious, skin-like finish with excellent coverage.

reviews.review_title: Heavy coverage but good lasting power
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I wore this foundation to lollapoolza and it was hot and humid and I was outside for hours so I will say the stay power is great. Beyond that though I think this foundation was just a little too heavy for me and I went in with a light hand but it still looked very heavy. So if you like full coverage I think this would be up your alley.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, perfect consistency, and blends well. I like carrying it in my bag for touch ups. Great coverage but not too heavy. It lasts a long day, really like that.

reviews.review_title: Didn’t work on my skin. Pulled and splotchy.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but unfortunately it didn’t work for me. I gave it a couple tries but each time it pilled and looked splotchy on my face even being moisturized well and exfoliated. Worth a try though. Love the packaging and small though. Beautiful product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very pigmented and full coverage. The finish is matte like so it doesn’t look greasy or oily! It blends beautifully without a beauty blender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect is exactly that - PERFECT! Good range of shades. I got 1N and it completely blurred my skin! Gorgeous matte finish. The packaging is exquisite and luxurious. I received so many compliments on my skin! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected from Dior at all especially with all the glowing reviews. I found it thick looking and not that easily blendable. The blurring effect didn’t last hardly any time, leaving my pores in stark relief smell is off putting like floral vanilla clay. Shade was spot on.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade range is impressive, catering to a wide spectrum of skin tones, which makes it easier to find the perfect match. The packaging is elegant and user-friendly, adding to the overall appeal.

reviews.review_title: A must try for a satiny finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this gift as a complimentary of Dior, and Influenster! The Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation stick has medium coverage. The texture is a satin finish and the shade range was the perfect match! I am in the shade 3 N Neutral which is great for olive undertone and green veins. The packaging is a sleek and dark packaging with the Dior symbol. I give it a 4 1/2 out of 5 stars! Wasn’t a a huge fan of the fragrance of the foundation, only because I have very sensitive skin! But they had my exact shade which I am super happy, because it is rare that I find my shade! Thank you Dior! 🩵

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very surprised by this foundation stick - I've tried so many liquid foundation, BB, and CC creams from Dr. Jart, YSL, Guerlain, and Giorgio Armani and none has worked like this! Upon first application, the foundations appears cakey, but eventually it appears like my natural skin. The color 2N definitely matched my skin, which was another surprise, and I barely had to make 4 swipes across my face to get full coverage (I prefer light, natural makeup wear). I do have slight hyperpigmentation from my acne scars on my cheeks and chin and redness on my nose, but I felt that the coverage was medium and buildable. My only complaint is that the foundation in the tube has a fragrance, but after applying it on my face I did not smell anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful full coverage foundation!! I typically wear it on days I wear heavier makeup and it lasts all day. When I apply I use a brush and swipe the product-then apply it to my face. The coverage is great, I don’t need to use a concealer on top of this. It blends nicely into my skin with proper prime and prep (my skin is on the dryer side). I would also be interested in purchasing a shade of this foundation to use as a contour/bronzer stick. The packaging  is BEAUTIFULLLL, it’s feel rich!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation stick from Dior. It has buildable coverage. I have been using it as a brightener under my eyes and around my nose and it stays put for the most part all day but because it’s in a tube it’s very easy to take with you for touch ups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! It feels so natural I got a darker shade to contour I feel like this can be multi purpose and the finish is natural. It’s also build able if you want to add more product it works well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is super creamy and easy to blend or layer with other makeup . Truly looks beautiful on the skin and isn’t drying . It has a medium coverage but is easy to build up . My only issue is that when I sweated the formula was easy to mess rub off and it didn’t blend that good around my nose but beside that I really like this stick foundation it’s quick to apply and is beautiful on the skin but I wouldn’t recommend for oily skins .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this foundation stick for my honest review and opinion, the packaging was super cute, I love how the foundation stick has the brand name on it, the foundation is full coverage and I love it, I revived the shade 1 warm which matched my skin tone perfectly, it blended great, didn’t leave any streaks / lines, unfortunately, the foundation stick does have a scent to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for my honest review.  I was kind of skeptical when I first opened it. It looked cakey and clay like, so I was nervous! When I applied it, definitely didn’t get the clay like texture. It went on smoothly. It lasts all day and works well with my other products. I was pleasantly impressed that it didn’t break my skin out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation sticks is super easy to use and easy blends in the skin ,it provides all day hydration and is lightweight,it get infused to skin and makes a no makeup look foundation,it long lasting and hides the pigment skin tone too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only “skin-like” foundation that actually looks like skin! I use a sponge for application and it gives perfect light/medium coverage, blends out seamlessly and actually looks like your skin, just more even. It’s the best foundation I’ve ever used! fragranced but that only lasts a minute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best foundations hands down. Very light weight. And I don’t even need to wear concealer because this covers my under eyes perfect.so easy to apply and use a little bit goes a long ways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is medium coverage and has a natural finish. I loved the lightweight feel and the cream formula. It blends beautifully and smells amazing. I wish it came in more shades as I am normally a 3W, however the color worked for highlighting my midpoints where my redness is anyways. I am a huge fan of Dior foundations and this one fits beautifully in the lineup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very amazing product love the decent smell to it and its packaging . It’s blend able and the coverage is off top must try

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 CR Cool Rosy - very light skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decent foundation stick but still oxidized in a few hours. I’ve always enjoyed the foundations from Dior, the texture, the finish look, the smell. This foundation stick overall is doing a good job, good coverage, good color options, nice package. But it is the old problem with Door foundation, the oxidation , that I really wanted to ask Dior to fix. This foundation will oxidized in a couple hours and darkened at least a tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Flight attendant/makeup artist here: I waited until I had a 12 hour duty day to review this product. I have oily, acne prone skin. First of all the application is SEAMLESS, it really is love at first sight. It blends in effortlessly and the color match was pretty darn great. It truly is pore blurring especially for someone with larger pores. It does seem to get a little oily after a few hours but not enough to bother me, I just used a pressed powder to touch up. I feel like this will be perfect for the winter months, just maybe a little too luminous for summer/fall in Vegas…it’s still hot af. I’m going to continue wearing though!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 00 N Neutral - very light skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great amazing formula love the packaging as well

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful foundation! I don’t drag the stick onto my skin, but rather take my brush and swipe the foundation onto it. I find it leaves a super natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: - With Dior Forever Skin Perfect and its iconic long-wearing foundation formula, skin appears flawless and even and pores are tightened, from morning to night. This liquid foundation not only instantly enhances the skin. -Dior Forever Skin Perfect has good oil control properties and is long-lasting, easily covering imperfections such as acne, dark circles, and uneven skin tone completely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Face Stick in shade 2N. At first I wasn’t too sure if I liked it but now it’s my favorite. Sometimes I use it as my foundation. Other times I use it as a concealer, under my eyes. I love the coverage either way and how well it blends. It’s very easy to apply and my skin looks great afterwards. It does not clog my pores or gets cakey at all. I highly recommend this!

reviews.review_title: An excellent choice for those that travel!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stands out as one of the best I've used. It offers super smooth application with exceptional blendability, has a light floral perfume scent, and offers medium coverage that you can build upon with a luminous matte finish. The packaging is appealing whilst being exceptionally travel friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was so exited to try this foundation but there is something about it that doesn’t look good once it’s on. I have combination skin and it just looks weird. The texture, pores are enhanced. It looks cakey. Have worn it with and without the primer but it doesn’t seem to work at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this foundation. This was my first time using foundation stick and I am super impressed. It gave me nice coverage which lasted all day. It is buildable so you can get the coverage you want. It made my skin look hydrated and blurred my pores. Use this to achieve that flawless make up. Love that they have shades for lighter, darker and in-between skin tones. There is no doubt on how expensive  the packaging look of all the Dior products and this one is no exception . Absolutely in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the coverage, it leaves it natural and with a slight shine, looking like natural and hydrated skin, it is super easy to apply, it works both with a sponge and with your finger and the smell is very comfortable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful foundation, easy to blend and perfect shade match, last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It’s easy to match my skin tone and it looks beautiful on - easy to have medium coverage and it lasts all day if you set it! The stick formulation is convenient and easy to apply as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an honest review. I use and love my (NON-incentivized) Dior complexion products. The Dior Face and Body is my go to full coverage foundation and I use the Forever Concealer daily for a quick five minute face. The Dior Foundation Stick embodies both products in a travel/purse friendly form. You can do a full face or dot on as a concealer with your fingers making it a minimalist’s dream complexion product. I blends out beautifully and leaves a natural finish.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the natural coverage. Last all day in outside temperatures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I actually really like this product I won like how it smells, but I know that’s weird but I I did like how it smelled and I also liked how smooth it was on my skin. Would I go out of my way to buy this? I’m not sure, but have I used it since I’ve received it yes. ￼

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the feel of this on my face. It’s super smooth and soft. It doesn’t leave a tacky finish at all. Unfortunately it’s not the right color for my skin so I can’t use it, which is a real disappointment because I think I would have used it a lot. The packaging it beautiful and the skin tint comes out from the bottle with a nice twist. It doesn’t have a scent which is always a win in my book.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best foundations I have ever used (I'm 74, so it's a lot).  You can customize coverage.  Even with going heavy it still looks skin like.  I wish the shade range was bigger.  I would like to see a 1.5W and some light olive shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation. It's easy to apply. It's easy to blend out and looks good when you do. It works well with both powder and cream products on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this Dior stick foundation, but unfortunately it was the wrong color and it just did not work for my skin. It went on easily and blended out like butter but it made my skin look horrible. It enhanced my pores and clung to any and all dry patches I had and just looked cakey no matter how little product I used. This will have to be a no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never tried a makeup product from this brand and wow was I impressed. This skin perfect stick has gotten a lot of use!!!! The formula is so soft and creamy, making it a breeze to blend out. I love the way it leaves my skin looking smooth, and doesn’t settle into my pores!!! It’s also super handy to take on the go!! The coverage is also very nice!! This has become my go to for helping cover my dark circles and blemishes!! It’s long lasting as well!! I’ve worn this to work, and even after being outside for hours my makeup still looks amazing!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It goes on so easily and so beautifully. I love using it with my fingers and it is very easy to blend. It evens out my skin tone and is so easy to use and carry around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product. Super smooth on the skin. Easy stick application. Nice luxurious packaging as to be expected from Dior. The shade range runs a bit dark. I ordered 2c. In fair skinned and it’s too dark even with my summer color. But it’s still a nice product. Smooth and hydrating on the skin. Didn’t cling to any dry spots on me. I didn’t test the true longevity but it seams to wear nice and blend with other makeup products. I would buy in my shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this produce over the past couple of weeks I’ve really enjoyed the convenience of it. I can throw it in my bag for touch ups and don’t have to worry about spills. It does have a scent to it that I enjoy but if you’re sensitive to fragrance it may bother you. In full transparency, I received this product as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best foundation I have tried so far. It's extremely blendable. It's not a heavy scent and the coverage is medium but buildable. I liked the packaging. The foundation glides on beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! It applies extremely well. Doesn't make your lines stand out. It does not look cakey. This foundation looks ans feels very silky to apply. Has a bit of a fragrance scent that I don't care for. Medium coverage. Great foundation stick.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation and I kick myself it. I normally despise foundation as I have sensory issues with my face and I can just feel them all (but I keep on trying because I'm a glutton for punishment) but not with this one. I apply a little bit to all my red areas and use a damp blender and it's so beautiful. It looks so skin like and I don't feel weird with it on at all. The coverage is very blendable and I really like the fact it's in a stick, making it easier to travel with.  BUT my one big issue is pretty darn big. I love fragrance in products but this one is so strong. And it lingers. If you are sensitive to fragrance, I, with a heavy heart, cannot recommend this one.  Honestly, I think the fragrance can be a major turn off for most people. But if you can handle a floral fragrance, this formula is stunning. On lighter days, I even use this as a concealer, it's that good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried on the shade 3N Neutral. The coverage was great and it felt very light on my skin. I love this travel friendly packaging and it definitely was my first choice when going on vacation. The packaging also made it feel very luxurious to use. One thing to keep in mind is that it’s always better to shade match in person. On photos this shade comes off darker than it actually is in real life when you apply it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVEEEEEE! The radiant skin finish, the beautiful sleek package.  The foundation gives you a glow while also being full coverage. I tried using the stick on my face and with a brush but I got better coverage with the brush. It smell so fresh and rich not strong at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this but not at 1st few applications I almost returned it but loved the texture so much I made it work. Combo skin may need to skip moisturizer if you use serums. It changed the whole look and texture. Summer Fridays CC serum, ISDIN tinted sunscreen, hourglass vanish airbrush primer in T-zone and Dior stick work perfect together. Stays all day even through Zumba class

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are combo with texture you will need to learn what works. I have found skipping the moisturizer changes the entire effect of the foundation on me. Started out looking like colored  chicken skin now it looks great. I use patchiness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was my first trying foundation sticks and I love the texture of this one. The coverage is great and it blends really well with a brush which is what I used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Omg, I am so happy to find this product! It makes my skin completely different in a good way. It even out your tone and make skin look luxurious. I have oily skin and it is amazing for me! And it’s so convenient! I can just put it in my purse and reapply if needed during the day. Recommend! 🫶🏻

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved Dior and this stuff does not disappoint! It goes on smooth and stays all day. The coverage is wonderful and the formula is very  nice. Packaging is great it has no scent which is always nice!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 9 N Neutral - very deep skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I not a big fan of makeup cause my face breaks out easily I use it here and there ! This is a great product with a beautiful coverage and finish! It’s blends well into my skin & it has a decent smell. Get to test for free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely my new favorite foundation stick!! And in my top 5 foundations! This is gorgeous on the skin. Sets without powder although I prefer a little powder. Blurs on its own. TGorgeous product! I don’t know why but I bought a shade

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works beautifully. One of the best foundations these days.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Application glides on skin super easily and also blends really well. The look of it appears cakey and does not have good coverage of pores. Super good scent, nothing too strong. Gives for of a matte finish and feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was scared when I opened the tube, it looked too dark, but its lighter once applied.  I usually use Beautyblender brand foundation in 2.20.  This Dior product I found has a better feel, finish and color.  I saw some apply this with a brush, but I thought it looked splotchy looking so I used a beauty blender applicator.  I like it a lot, I would buy it again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 9 N Neutral - very deep skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent shade 4: Deep. I was a little disappointed that I won’t be able to use this as it is nowhere near my skin tone. Nevertheless, the product itself is very nice. The contour stick has a slight fragrance to it. It glides onto the skin well and is easy to blend and build. I would love to try it in my own shade.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this finish is so beautiful. it’s very lightweight and easy to blend. the packaging is to die for it’s so luxurious. the coverage is just as good as the liquid foundation and easy to build up as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did a great job going on, it covered my blemishes and had a lovely finish. My shade matched perfectly and my sling looked great.   My only issue is I wore this out on a very hot day and it basically melted off my face in a way I’ve never seen before. I’ll definitely use it in the winter though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so glad I’ve got to try this stick, this is now one of my favorites! I liked that I can use it for multi purpose, as a foundation, concealer or even just a touch up throughout the day, it glides on so smoothly and delivers a very nice matte finish, it also blurs imperfections which what I’m so in love about this, very nice scent and perfect size to throw in my purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so glad I’ve got to try this stick, this is now one of my favorites! I liked that I can use it for multi purpose, as a foundation, concealer or even just a touch up throughout the day, it glides on so smoothly and delivers a very nice matte finish, it also blurs imperfections which what I’m so in love about this, very nice scent and perfect size to throw in my purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is quite an amazing product. It has great shade range and therefore there is something for everyone. The texture is quite creamy and blend very easily. It gives medium to full coverage and you can build up the coverage level. It looks like skin and gives a very filtered effect. The colour shade matches, my skin tone perfectly andit does not irritate my acne skin at all. The packaging is travel friendly.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, perfect consistency, and blends well. I like carrying it in my bag for touch ups. Great coverage but not too heavy. It lasts a long day, really like that.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 W Warm - very light skin with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, perfect consistency, and blends well. I like carrying it in my bag for touch ups. Great coverage but not too heavy. It lasts a long day, really like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Saw this hyped up on Instagram so I tried it out. I was sorely disappointed. It does not go on well and settles in every. Single. Pore. I really wanted a smooth full coverage and this was not it for me. 2 stars for easy color match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What a great foundation from Dior. Honestly Dior doesn’t miss! I love this foundation stick it is convenient and has great coverage. It has a dewy satin formula and finish. I like to take my time sometimes to get ready so I like that I can let this sit on my face and it will still blend beautifully after a few minutes. I find it works better with fingers or a dry sponge.I think I might have found my holy grail. It is the perfect medium coverage. It is like skin, I’m truly not exaggerating.  You could thin it out or layer it for more than medium and it layers beautifully with concealer and takes powder well! Well I noticed though was that my face seemed to look better after a few hours of wearing it and my skin felt better after washing it off! The tube has beautiful packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product. First of all it smells really good, second of all it perfectly matched my shade. It lasted all day and it looked like a matte finish and it blended perfectly. I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_title: Decent foundation but fix the oxidation issue plz
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decent foundation stick but still oxidized in a few hours. I’ve always enjoyed the foundations from Dior, the texture, the finish look, the smell. This foundation stick overall is doing a good job, good coverage, good color options, nice package. But it is the old problem with Door foundation, the oxidation , that I really wanted to ask Dior to fix. This foundation will oxidized in a couple hours and darkened at least a tone.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. First of all if you’re sensitive to scent this may not be the product for you because it does have an artificial typical Dior product scent (but it fades really quickly). The coverage is great. Typically I’m only looking for a light cover and will do the stick very lightly and blend it in, but it would also be easy to lay on thicker if you’re looking for high-coverage. I’ve been noticing if I use it on top of my skincare routine it’s easy to have a Dewey finish, but I’ve also tried it when my skincare has been set and it leaves a more matte like finish. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. First of all if you’re sensitive to scent this may not be the product for you because it does have an artificial typical Dior product scent (but it fades really quickly). The coverage is great. Typically I’m only looking for a light cover and will do the stick very lightly and blend it in, but it would also be easy to lay on thicker if you’re looking for high-coverage. I’ve been noticing if I use it on top of my skincare routine it’s easy to have a Dewey finish, but I’ve also tried it when my skincare has been set and it leaves a more matte like finish. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Dior in exchange for my honest review. This was the first time I tried a foundation stick, I usually opt for liquid and cream foundation but I’m in love with this Dior foundation stick. It’s so convenient that I’ll be taking it to travel. It’s very easy to apply directly to my face or my beauty sponge. It blends easily and it doesn’t dry right away so you have time to blend it. I went for a medium coverage but it is very buildable to a full coverage. I’m very oily so I usually prefer matte foundation but this foundation looked so natural and a bit of glow for a healthy looking skin. I did not set it at all with powder and it only set a little bit around my lip. I’m very impressed and the color was almost perfect to my skin tone. Can you tell I love this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product has such cute packaging! I love everything about it is a very full coverage doesn’t have a smell blends very softly overall is just a very good product !!!!￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all A++ to marketing team that chose Anya and Willow as campaign models, onto the actual product I really enjoy it ! As pictured I am unfortunately breaking out BAD atm but aside from that the actual product does what it says , I have dry sensitive acne prone skin and this didn’t irritate me one bit , no lines or pores were emphasized given it claims to be blurring I’m really impressed , HOWEVER for me the concealing claim was not gonna do the job for my under eyes I’ve added my pic with one under eye w and w/o the Dior stick. My last criticism is that it showed up and the product was loose from the packaging and smudged but I was able to snap it back in pretty easily so I’d say maybe a one off but I’ve been wanting to sample a Dior foundation for awhile now and this has definitely made their base products seem promising and this is a beautiful skin like foundation stick perfect for everyday and awesome for travel and touch ups, Great job Dior

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is buildable which I love. It is long lasting. It works well with other products. I will be purchasing this product again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never really used a foundation stick before but this was a little awkward to use because it was a little stiff and hard to blend. The coverage was full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product for testing purposes and was absolutely blown away. The application was fantastic and so easy to blend out. Was a shade to dark for me but that was my own fault. Still made it work with some concealer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation stick. It is more on the matte side and keeps my oil in-check, but also has a bit of a glowy sheen to it so it doesn’t look unnatural. I haven’t tried other foundation sticks before, but I love this one. It is also great to use for touch-ups and it blends well with my other face products. I use a brush to buff it in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick is so luxurious, not only the sleek packaging but the actual foundation itself, it truly blends like a dream. It melts completely into the skin for a flawless coverage. It can be used sparingly for a light coverage or can be used for full coverage. It’s very lightweight and feels like nothing on the skin. It leaves a silky texture on the skin. Will definitely buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick is so luxurious, not only the sleek packaging but the actual foundation itself, it truly blends like a dream. It melts completely into the skin for a flawless coverage. It can be used sparingly for a light coverage or can be used for full coverage. It’s very lightweight and feels like nothing on the skin. It leaves a silky texture on the skin. Will definitely buy!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed is an understatement!! The makeup stick slid on easily and was so blendable! Looked airbrushed and felt super lightweight on the skin. The coverage was medium despite looking very natural. Shade was a little too light but nothing a little bronzer couldn’t fix. Overall I’m a huge fan and my makeup lasted 10+ hours easily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from an influencer to get my honest review of the product. It is so easy to apply, gives great coverage that is buildable, is super lightweight and just looks so flawless. I love the blurring effect it has, and that it is hydrating and super easy to blend. The color I received is a little bit too dark for me wish I would've gotten a better color to match my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is it.  I am in my mid 40s and I have been using the Dior Matte foundation and Chanel Vitalumiere foundation forever.  I needed a foundation stick to carry with me.  I  discovered this one and I LOVE it!!!

reviews.review_title: Very bad for dry textured skin
reviews.review_text: I have textured dry skin at the moment and this foundation looked absolutely awful, emphasazing everything. It’s my only foundation that does that, and for Dior I was expecting something better.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 3 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a foundation for my aging, combo textured skin! Exceeded my expectations! Gave me the coverage I needed. Looked airbrushed while feeling lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This is a creamy concealer, with moderate to heavy coverage. The color match was very poor on my skin tone, which is likely my fault. The packaging feels luxurious at dior products usually do. With my dry skin, the product was fairly flaky, and did not blend very well. I would recommend that you spend time prepping your skin if you have dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was perfect!! I used it to enhance my look for my maternity shoot and wow! I normally wouldn’t spend a lot of foundation but I think I’ll be order another one once this runs out. The coverage wasn’t heavy or oily! It sat on my skin well and when I got hot, it glistened but didn’t smear which was great! The shade itself could have been a bit better but overall it matched enough for it to work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and DIOR in exchange for my honest review.  Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick in Shade 1N  I’ve been using the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick in shade 1N for a few weeks now, and I’m absolutely impressed. As someone with fair skin, finding the perfect match can be tricky, but 1N blends seamlessly with my complexion.  The texture is incredibly smooth, gliding effortlessly over my skin without feeling heavy or cakey. I love how versatile this stick is; it’s perfect for both full coverage and light touch-ups throughout the day. The finish is natural with a subtle glow, which I appreciate since it doesn’t look overly matte or dewy—just a nice, healthy radiance.  One of my favorite things about this product is its portability. The stick format makes it super easy to carry in my bag, and it’s great for quick touch-ups on the go. It also doubles as a concealer, which is a huge plus for me.  Overall, the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick in 1N has become a staple in my makeup routine. It’s definitely worth the investment if you’re looking for a high-quality foundation that delivers on both performance and convenience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the wrong shade but I was honestly shocked upon applying this foundation stick. It glides on so smoothly it just melted the product into the skin. I absolutely loved the coverage it provided. Did not dry out my skin at all. Unfortunately because my skin is very oily the matte look did not last long but it did give a natural glowy look despite my oily skin. Not once did it get to the point where it looked like sweat. It covered up my dark bags and spots, and removal was very easy. I will be purchasing in the correct shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Meh…this was just okay for me. I was excited to try this one since it’s supposed to blur. The dry down does have a sort of softness to it, but the formula clung to my pores and didn’t seem to help my texture much at all. It felt like the foundation was just sitting on top of my skin. I also think the packaging is pretty lackluster given the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent, buildable coverage, soft natural finish, semi matte. Package is GREAT for travel and allows for easy application using a finger or a brush. I find this foundation to blend better with a brush as I get heavier coverage when I use a finger or swipe on. As someone who prefers a long lasting, natural medium coverage, I’m a big fan of this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! Smooth application and super easy to blend. Buildable coverage. Long lasting with a natural matte finish! It doesn’t look dry or cakey either!

reviews.review_title: Finally Dior has a good replacement for Airflash
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stick. It is the first foundation I have really liked since they canceled airflash that I bought up all over the place. I actually like this so much better. It is so easy to apply and looks great. The colors are the same as the airflash so you can just get what you used before. Great product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on extremely well and smooth! Creamy product. I think it does have a bit of a perfumed scent so if you are sensitive to fragrances in skincare products this may not be for you. Packaging is very nice but not super special (very classic)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on extremely well and smooth! Creamy product. I think it does have a bit of a perfumed scent so if you are sensitive to fragrances in skincare products this may not be for you. Packaging is very nice but not super special (very classic)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous foundation stick, such a smooth application and perfect texture. Beautiful packaging. Give you perfect medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Photoshop in real time. Ideally adapts to skin tone and hides imperfections (redness, post-acne and even wreaths under the eyes). The effect is so natural that you can never tell that there is makeup on your face. The stick also takes great care of the skin, making it look like it was blurred in Photoshop. One touch with the stick and a light tap with your finger is enough to make your skin perfect. And the case itself in which the stick is located is above all praise, very stylish and beautiful design. Thank you Dior

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dior forever skin tint is stunning! I love how easy it glides onto my face and doesn’t smudge at all. The tint helped my foundation look stunning and not cakey at all! It also has a certain flower scent that I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a beautiful creamy texture that glides smoothly. The coverage is medium but buildable. If you have dry skin, this foundation will work so well for it. It doesn't cling to dryness. I accidentally went a shade darker, but I did manage to make it work for me. This foundation has a scent, the classic dior scent. The finish is nautral, not greasy or shiny. I didn't find this foundation to oxidize, which was a big plus, and it was comfortable and breathable. The shade I got is 2.5 Neutral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I typically don't write makeup reviews but I had to write something for this one. Hands down, the best foundation stick I have ever used. I love how easy it is to use. It has replaced liquid foundation for me most weekdays because it is SO easy and quick to use as you are running out the door. The consistency is creamy and very spreadable. While it is pricey, it is very high quality, so that is worth it to me. I am curious how long it will last being used 3-4 times per week - Hopefully a while! A perfect shade match and wears well throughout the day!

reviews.review_title: Love the longevity of this foundation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally love this foundation! So light weight and creamy. Wore it from 7am-4pm and it remained in place and flawless! Love love love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried probably every foundation out there for VERY oily skin, and so far? I am loving this!  Easy to apply,  little to no oxidation, staying power,  and not heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately the shade was not for me, but it was creamy and easy to blend. It has a smooth finish on the skin. I just wish it was the right shade for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the creamy texture of this concealer stick and how easily it blends and how many different ranges of shades it comes in, but I don’t understand why they needed to add fragrance to it has a purfume smell which doesn’t feel safe using on ur skin other than that I do love everything else about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation in the wrong shade, so I was unable to fully assess its coverage. However, I can provide feedback on its wearability, texture, and scent.  For those with dry or normal skin, or who don't sweat excessively, the foundation can last for the whole day without fading. However, it might be a bit difficult to remove at the end of the day... I guess that's why it offers 24 hours of coverage! On oily skin I noticed that the foundation faded sooner, and it does transfer a bit. The scent is subtle and pleasant, not overpowering, and it comes in 18 shades, giving more of a chance to find one that matches better with your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly awesome! Silky smooth. Looks like your skin but with super even skin tone. Looked great all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love using this product! the consistency is nice and creates a great end result! i use this product in my daily routine and i would not change it for anything! i will definitely keep repurchasing in the future when my stash runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

I applied blush on top and it applied nicely. The foundation lasted for the whole day. I wore it outside during the sunny days and it stayed on just fine. Definitely worth it! I receive this product for free in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. This is my new favorite face product! It is creamy, hydrating, blends like a dream and has a medium coverage, dewy finish. Wowza. It looks like your skin but better. I’m 1CR, and the color works perfectly (Opal shade in Bare minerals complexion rescue).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I took a chance on this and I'm so glad I did! I have never found a stick foundation that works i.e. no greasy mess sliding off my face. This is so easy, blendable and natural looking! Perfect for a quick run out the door or and evening out. Lasts all day on my mature skin and doesn't enhance texture. Love it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1 CR Cool Rosy - very light skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

The stick is packaged very well, not concerned it will break off as it clicks into place. The finish I would describe as satin and I would call the coverage medium but buildable. Sometimes I do find it settles into my pores but that’s mainly when I don’t prep my skin well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very drying and emphasizes peach fuzz. It also moves around if you touch your face at all. For example, I applied the foundation and then proceeded to do my brows, and just from my hand touching my face in the process, the foundation moved. I will be returning it. Please bring back the Dreamskin Cushion Compact. It was a much better product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2,5 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

This foundation gives a natural finish so beautiful with medium coverage. Unfortunately, after a while It started to show a little of my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this one! I have tried many foundation stick but this one is a winner above them. It glides on so smoothly and it’s like second skin! Also works well with the Merit Great Skin Priming Moisturizer.  100% recommended!

reviews.review_title: Decent foundation but plz fix the oxidation issue
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decent foundation stick but still oxidized in a few hours. I’ve always enjoyed the foundations from Dior, the texture, the finish look, the smell. This foundation stick overall is doing a good job, good coverage, good color options, nice package. But it is the old problem with Door foundation, the oxidation , that I really wanted to ask Dior to fix. This foundation will oxidized in a couple hours and darkened at least a tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Genuinely, this is my new favorite. The packaging is sleek and feels luxe. Typically scented facial products break my face out, this stuff actually makes my skin feel more hydrated. I took a video to show the finish and coverage. That was a heavy handed application. I typically wear it slightly less full coverage. It fits my skin tone perfect and balances out my redness. It stays on all day without budging or making me oily like other moisturizing products. I even wore this while working out once accidentally. And it literally didn’t move. I can’t say enough great things. I hate that it’s $50+ as I can’t see myself buying this often, but for a foundation stick this product does go a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect wedding foundation. Classy packaging with amazing coverage! Unfortunately the neutral shade I chose is extremely dark compared to other foundations that are labeled as neutral I definitely would have gone a whole lot lighter if I was aware of that before hand but either way I love it as even just a bronzer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has amazing coverage and it’s shade range is amazing and it blends out like a dream a little goes along way. I’m so in love with this product. And the packaging is so cute

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product is horrific. Cause hives all over my face and neck that took me over 2 weeks to get somewhat back to normal. I have sensitive skin and this was the ONLY new thing I used. I did a patch test as well and it turned up the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t usually wear foundation. But this, now I do. The coverage is medium, but buildable. It’s got a super natural finish that I would say is satin, not Dewey. I put it directly on my face and blended with a sponge. The packaging is sturdy and easy to use. No scent. I have loved using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will say this changed my mind about stick foundations. It is more of a natural looking finish as opposed to flat matte and it blends well. It had a scent if you don’t scented products this isn’t for you. It’s a good foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love using this product! the consistency is nice and creates a great end result! i use this product in my daily routine and i would not change it for anything! i will definitely keep repurchasing in the future when my stash runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Dior foundations. I've never been a fan of stick foundations but this one has changed my mind. I love the coverage how it feels on my skin. I won't recommend this if you don't like scents. It's really annoying that they do that.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
