reviews.review_title: Too dark for pale girls/not worth the price tag :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick has quite a bit of product, and is incredibly creamy to blend. Coverage is buildable to medium with a natural finish. Alas the shade 1 cool rosy is way too red/dark for pale skin girlies. I’ll never understand why the lightest cool tone shades of foundation are darker than the lightest neutral shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I accidentally got the wrong shade (9N Neutral), but when I tried it on my hand (as seen in the photo), I was impressed by how smooth it felt. It blends effortlessly and feels great on the skin. Even though the shade wasn’t right, it still gave a flawless finish. I’ll be giving this product to my friend who has a darker complexion and getting the correct shade for myself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from in exchange for my honest review. First off the packaging is beautiful, and the product itself is very professional & gorgeous looking. This product has a great shade range for all skin tones, which I appreciate. This color in particular is perfect for me, and blends in seamlessly with my own skin tone. It provides medium coverage, but is buildable and gives off a matte finish that lasts all day. I love that it is in a stick form so it’s not only easy to apply, but less messy and more convenient to use. I don’t have any major issues with this product. It does exactly what it aims to do and you can tell at first glance that it is very good quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation stick! It has a natural finish that blends like a dream! It glides on smoothly and evens out my imperfections effortlessly. It has good coverage and is easily buildable without looking cakey. They have about 18 different shades for this line, which is great! It was easy to find my shade. The formula doesn’t emphasize texture like a lot of stick foundations tend to do. It has a heat and humidity resistant formula and definitely has a “blurring effect” on my skin. Dior claims that it can be used as foundation or as concealer for on the go touch ups. I have only used it as foundation, not as concealer but I am excited to try it in that way. This product does have a scent to it, a very luxe scent. But it does not last long and it only present when applying. The packaging is great for on the go convenience and feels luxurious. Overall, I love the effect it gave my skin and I definitely recommend. I received this product complimentary from Influenster but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good colour match for my super pale skin. I was hoping a something thick enough to be a stick wouldn't pool in my pores, but it did. Also heavily perfumed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product is very good quality. It is creamy and gentle on the skin, and gives a clean not to thick coverage, just enough to cover uneven skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought this stick hoping it would work for me. I have normal skin and a bit oily in the t zone.After trying it in different climates( humid and hot, dry and hot) here are pros and cons Pros: blurs pores, once you can spread it over the face it looks quite nice. Cons: Difficult to spread over moisturized face, broke apart in the t zone. Just looked greasy after 8 hours. Color of stick seems a bit orange compared to the matte foundation in same shadeface  Face face it looks nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. This is my favorite stick foundation of all time! I picked it in the shade 3.5N which is definitely too deep for me most of the year, but I wanted it to be a good summer shade and winter bronzer and I’m totally satisfied with it for both functions. The shade is very neutral, with appropriate depth for a 3.5 and the coverage is quite full but has a beautiful natural finish. It does deepen slightly on me after blending, but I wouldn’t call it oxidation. The coconut and other oils make this a creamy seamless application and blend though it looks gorgeous all day and doesn’t get patchy or slip and slide. It doesn’t need to be powdered on my normal/dry skin. The packaging is somewhat lighter than I would have expected, but the price and quantity is appropriate for what you get. There is a scent when first applied (typical of Dior) that fades away in moments and can’t be detected later. I adore this product and have already purchased it in my winter shade to use as concealer as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation. The coverage is buildable. It has a great match finish on my skin also depending on what moisturizer I use. It’s easy to blend. And it smells amazing. I did have slight irritation by the scent, but it was not unbearable. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It goes on so smooth. It’s easily applied, it just glides over the face making it easily blend-able.  It does have a slight light perfume scent to it which I don’t mind. It lasts long over the face, but works better if coverup is used on under eye if you have dark circles then this product if you use it as a foundation. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin

It covers very well, and although I could probably go up a shade or two, it blends well even if you’re a smidge off in color. It isn’t too shiny or too matte, and works very well with translucent powder on top. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very good foundation and easy to use, it blends easily and has a very good formula, soft and smooth, the packaging makes it easy to take anywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Genuinely, this is my new favorite. The packaging is sleek and feels luxe. Typically scented facial products break my face out, this stuff actually makes my skin feel more hydrated. I took a video to show the finish and coverage. That was a heavy handed application. I typically wear it slightly less full coverage. It fits my skin tone perfect and balances out my redness. It stays on all day without budging or making me oily like other moisturizing products. reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product has a slight smell to it but I honestly don’t mind it. The packaging is pretty and has a clean, luxurious look. The application process is very easy, but I did notice the foundation clinging on to dry patches and setting powder definitely emphasized it. The foundation also didn’t mix well with the oils on my t-zone, but the rest of my face looked beautiful. If you have normal skin you will love this foundation. If you have oily skin your oils will eventually break through the foundation. The coverage is buildable and does not look cakey. I personally will continue to use this foundation. I will just make sure to exfoliate and prime my face very well before use.

reviews.review_text: I'm not a fan of the stick foundation because I feel like they don't go with my skin type, which is Oily. the product is easy to apply and blur, but it feels heavy. The coverage is 10/10 and the finish is natural.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 3 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation. It’s very easy to use and the shade matches my skin tone perfectly . The packaging is very cute. the texture is very smooth  and it’s  blend able. It’s gives continuous hydration and stays for a long time. Amazing quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. This foundation stick has really impressed me. I have tried many different brands over the years, and so far, this one is my favourite. I know that is a bold statement. The formula glides on and blends in so easily. I have oily skin, and with some setting powder and spray, this foundation lasts all day. It is also easy to blend other creams and powders on top of. The shade 2.5N is the perfect neutral shade on my skin. I am so happy with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this products packaging! The scent is nice and light- hard to describe but it’s a pleasant scent. I think it blends out really nicely and the coverage is light to medium. It’s very nice but at an expensive price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Personal Stick has a smooth and creamy texture that feels soft on the skin. Applying it is easy; the stick glides on effortlessly and blends well without needing much effort. I appreciate that it does not feel heavy or greasy, making it comfortable to wear throughout the day.  The coverage provided by this stick is excellent. It effectively conceals blemishes, dark spots, and uneven skin tones, giving my face a more uniform appearance. The finish is neither too matte nor too shiny, which helps achieve a natural, radiant look. I find that it balances well with my skin’s natural oils, keeping my face looking fresh without needing constant touch-ups. The Dior Personal Stick blends seamlessly with my skin tone, which I really appreciate. It does not cause any breakouts or irritation, and it feels gentle and soothing on my skin.  One of the standout features of this stick is its lasting power. It stays in place throughout the day without needing frequent reapplication. Even after a long day, my makeup still looks good, which is a big plus for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Personal Stick has a smooth and creamy texture that feels soft on the skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, perfect consistency, and blends well. I like carrying it in my bag for touch ups. Great coverage but not too heavy. It lasts a long day, really like that.

I have been HUNTING for a new foundation that can easily be applied anywhere due to me needing touch ups often. This is not only an amazing formula, but the packaging makes it easy to take on the go anywhere! I love how this makes my skin look, it’s super pretty and not cakey! I have had no issues with it and it actually stays put for hours without any touch ups really needed! I have also tried using this as just a concealer too which worked amazing. I love how it doesn’t feel as if I’m drying my skin out when applying and has a pretty finish to it. I love this!

reviews.review_title: adds a touch of luxury to my makeup bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Certainly adds a touch of luxury to my makeup bag💝✨  ngl I’m impressed by the stick's elegant  design and high-quality formulation.  Pros: 🌟 The concealer does a fabulous job of blurring imperfections and blending seamlessly with my skin tone. Overall, a luxurious concealer with excellent coverage.   Cons:  The need to apply the product directly from the tube could potentially spread bacteria, which might be a concern for those with acne-prone skin.  At $50, I wouldn’t buy this for myself. I would never spend more than like $15 on a concealer.   If you have significant under-eye circles or other blemishes that require heavy coverage, and can justify the expense, this Dior option is worth considering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Dior is on the top of my list of foundation/face makeup brands and with the Forever Skin Perfect, it was no surprise to me when I did my test wear and fell in love! This foundation is medium coverage but it’s definitely buildable and still has that beautiful skin like glow to it. Although it’s a stick formula, it’s very easy to blend and doesn’t pill over/under other products, like other foundation sticks I’ve tried. Unfortunately, the shade match wasn’t the best for me during the summer months (as you can see in the photos) but I’ll be saving it to wear in the next few months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it.  Smoothed my pores instantly on my cheeks.  Use a brush to apply it and don't swipe it directly on to the face.  Game changer.

reviews.review_title: Everything you want in a luxury foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick has quickly become one of my go-to products for achieving a flawless complexion. The foundation stick offers excellent coverage that is buildable, allowing for a natural look or a more full-coverage finish depending on your needs. It has a beautiful, natural finish that doesn’t look cakey or heavy, which I absolutely love.  This product is incredibly easy to apply. The stick format is convenient for on-the-go touch-ups and precise application. It glides smoothly onto the skin and blends effortlessly with a brush, sponge, or even fingertips. The Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick has impressive staying power. It lasts throughout the day without needing frequent touch-ups, maintaining its fresh and smooth appearance from morning to night. The texture of the foundation is creamy and lightweight, which makes it comfortable to wear all day. It doesn’t feel heavy or greasy, and it sits beautifully on the skin without settling into fine lines or pores.  Overall, the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick is a standout product in my makeup routine. Its combination of coverage, comfort, and longevity makes it a must-have for anyone seeking a reliable foundation stick. This foundation stick is a true winner in the luxury beauty category, offering everything I look for in a high-quality foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. Super creamy. Easy to blend. The coverage is lovely. However no matter my skin prep or what I do it creases horribly under my eyes. I tried many different techniques to get it to not crease, but it still does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, perfect consistency, and blends well. I like carrying it in my bag for touch ups. Great coverage but not too heavy. It lasts a long day, really like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this foundation stick it goes on very smooth and does a good job softening lines and evening tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect Multi-Use Foundation Stick is a true skincare gem. Its soft, lightweight texture effortlessly blends into the skin, providing continuous hydration and a barely-there feel. With 24 hours of comfort, it’s perfect for those long days. Whether you’re aiming for a natural look or building up coverage, this stick delivers. Plus, it’s available in a wide range of shades, making it suitable for various skin tones. If you’re seeking a versatile foundation that lets your skin breathe, Dior Forever Skin Perfect is a solid choice! You can carry in your purse anywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This makeup stick has a nice finish and has easy buildability and blendability. It has amazing coverage, and it lasts all day long. It is pretty useful that it comes in a stick. That way, you can also use it as a contour, or you can even apply directly on your skin.

reviews.review_title: Everything you want in a luxury foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick has quickly become one of my go-to products for achieving a flawless complexion. The foundation stick offers excellent coverage that is buildable, allowing for a natural look or a more full-coverage finish depending on your needs. It has a beautiful, natural finish that doesn’t look cakey or heavy, which I absolutely love.  This product is incredibly easy to apply. The stick format is convenient for on-the-go touch-ups and precise application. It glides smoothly onto the skin and blends effortlessly with a brush, sponge, or even fingertips. The Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick has impressive staying power. It lasts throughout the day without needing frequent touch-ups, maintaining its fresh and smooth appearance from morning to night. The texture of the foundation is creamy and lightweight, which makes it comfortable to wear all day. It doesn’t feel heavy or greasy, and it sits beautifully on the skin without settling into fine lines or pores.  Overall, the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick is a standout product in my makeup routine. Its combination of coverage, comfort, and longevity makes it a must-have for anyone seeking a reliable foundation stick. This foundation stick is a true winner in the luxury beauty category, offering everything I look for in a high-quality foundation.

reviews.review_title: I would for sure recommend this in your daily rout
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so lightweight. I absolutely love using this on my skin. I’ve actually had this since before, reviewing this on Influenster and swear by it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to see Dior have a stick foundation! Hello, easy and quick application! The product is well done and packaged, but it just didn’t work for me. The color still had a hint of yellow undertone even though it says cool, which may be attributed to my own skin color. Many products like Fenty and YSL always end up looking too yellow on me. Givenchy Prisme Libre and Chanel colors are a great match for me. I took off a star due to the skin irritation. I have autoimmune diseases that cause sensitive, dry skin. The scent was a bit much for me, but it is a pleasant one. Applying it… made my skin burn. Too irritating and had to return. Having said that, I think it would work well for most people with other skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this foundation. I received this product for free in exchange of my honest review. This foundation is very easy to blend and look so beautiful on my skin. It matches my skin tone perfectly.the packaging is very nice. I do recommend it to anyone interested in buying it. I will definitely be buying it when this one runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Perfect Stick Foundation is a total game-changer for on-the-go makeup lovers. The convenience of this stick format makes it incredibly easy to apply and blend, whether I’m at home or touching up while out and about. The formula is creamy and glides on smoothly, giving me buildable coverage that looks natural and flawless.  What I love most is how versatile this foundation is—it’s perfect for a quick, light application, but it can also be layered for more coverage without ever feeling heavy or cakey. The finish is absolutely gorgeous—radiant yet natural, with just the right amount of glow. Plus, it’s long-lasting, keeping my skin looking fresh all day without the need for constant touch-ups.  Another huge plus is how it feels on the skin—it’s lightweight and comfortable, almost like I’m wearing nothing at all. It also doesn’t settle into fine lines or emphasize pores, which is a major win. Dior has really nailed it with this stick foundation—it’s luxurious, effective, and super easy to use. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This dior skin tint correction is magical, I love how it matches perfectly with my skin tone, I chose the tint 1W (warm). This skin tint blends so easily just rub your fingers in a circular motion. I love that this skin tint doesn’t feel heavy when applied. The packaging is nice, has a heavy feeling to it. Looks like a matte finish when on your skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 8 N Neutral - very deep skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: such an amazing product ! the coverage is amazing and stunning ! it blends out so well and the scent smells very nice ! it’s has such cute packing and the finish is nice ! it also stays on for a long time ! would recommend !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used. Just so you know, I don’t have a primer so that could be why the uneven texture is shown in the pictures. Okay, so, this is literally a perfect match for my skin color, it is lightly perfumed and smells amazing, and it is so soft! You can’t tell you’re wearing it besides the sweet smell! A little goes a long way and it lasts all day. The texture you see on my skin isn’t as noticeable in person or from even a foot distance from my face, so don’t let that discourage you! This product made me go from not even using foundation to wanting to wear it every day even if I’m not going out! Also, the tube comes out of the casing to roll out more product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful foundation!! The shade matches me and application is really smooth. I like the ease of use & it’s portable so it’s perfect for on the go touchups. It’s unscented and non irritating. You do have to set it or else it may transfer. This did oxidize on my skin slightly but it was already a bit orange to begin with. With a good setting powder it’s not noticeable. Price point is fair for the brand but I can’t really tell how much product I’m getting until I use it up for the first time. Finish is natural and it makes my skin look healthy. Coverage is billable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love this foundation! it is a little more matte than im used to but it gave such good coverage and lasted me a whole night bartending. super creamy formula.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 00 N Neutral - very light skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Dior in exchange for my honest review. This was the first time I tried a foundation stick, I usually opt for liquid and cream foundation but I’m in love with this Dior foundation stick. It’s so convenient that I’ll be taking it to travel. It’s very easy to apply directly to my face or my beauty sponge. It blends easily and it doesn’t dry right away so you have time to blend it. I went for a medium coverage but it is very buildable to a full coverage. I’m very oily so I usually prefer matte foundation but this foundation looked so natural and a bit of glow for a healthy looking skin. I did not set it at all with powder and it only set a little bit around my lip. I’m very impressed and the color was almost perfect to my skin tone. Can you tell I love this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, perfect consistency, and blends well. I like carrying it in my bag for touch ups. Great coverage but not too heavy. It lasts a long day, really like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth application and easy to blend! Leaves skin feeling soft and glowy! One of the best foundations I’ve tried! I’m obsessed with how beautiful it looks on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a luxe foundation and I love the packaging. It makes my skin look so good! Blends really well and has good coverage. I’m on the oily side and this foundation looks beautiful on me. It’s easy to use and I’m very satisfied.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 00 N Neutral - very light skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has a nice smooth texture and gives nice instant full coverage in one swipe. The color is a little dark on me but it would work fine as a bronzer. The only issue I have is the Dior scent does linger around after the application for awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a nice finish and has easy build ability and blend ability with either a sponge or a brush. The only thing I dislike about it is the scent that lingers for a while even after application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Foundation Stick impressed me with its creamy texture and ease of application. It blends seamlessly, providing buildable coverage that looks natural and skin-like. I love how portable it is, making touch-ups on the go effortless. However, I found that it can settle into fine lines after a few hours, especially on dry skin. The finish is more dewy than matte, which works well for a fresh look but might not be ideal for oily skin types. Overall, it's a great option for a quick, flawless application, though not perfect for long-lasting wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Foundation Stick impressed me with its creamy texture and ease of application. It blends seamlessly, providing buildable coverage that looks natural and skin-like. I love how portable it is, making touch-ups on the go effortless. However, I found that it can settle into fine lines after a few hours, especially on dry skin. The finish is more dewy than matte, which works well for a fresh look but might not be ideal for oily skin types. Overall, it's a great option for a quick, flawless application, though not perfect for long-lasting wear.

reviews.review_title: Heavy, cakey & waxy - it’s a pass
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited for this - both Forever Skin foundations are in my HG collection  but the was a big fail. Too heavy, too cakey and almost waxy feeling. Reminds me of the Hourglass stick and not in a good way. Also SUPER perfumed. Such a shame.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 5 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They’re plenty of shades! I actually got this without tearing which shade was mines, I just looked through the reference photos! It’s pretty accurate for me to get a right shade. The texture is iffy, I have dry and oily skin so the product is literally melting on me. It is scented as well, the scent throws it off for me. It smells floral and fresh. I don’t like my product scented for coverage. This really works for my eye bags, I can’t seem to find any coverage without using orange color correction! Again, it melts for my face but with baking powder, it stays a little more better. I’d recommend if you know your skin texture won’t mess it up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought to use a stick foundation but this may possibly be the best thing I have ever put on my face. Blends so easy with my brush. I have been on a hunt for a good foundation and one that is not too greasy/dewy looking. This is absolutely perfect and so natural looking. It dries down and doesn’t feel tacky or sticky. Not cakey or heavy at all and just evens out your face without creasing. I may have to powder my t zone once a day but I found that’s the case with most foundations at this point no matter how matte it is (I have combo skin). I don’t mind a scent as long as it doesn’t break me out, so far so good! I think the price is worth it and even though it’s a stick I used it a few times and barely has moved so it should last a while.

reviews.review_title: It feels great on my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is medium to full coverage. I like to blend the foundation using a foundation brush. It’s long lasting. Definitely a special occasion type of makeup. The finish is pretty matte. I really liked how easy it is to use this foundation. I would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product!! Very natural finish. I didn’t want to like it because of the price but I LOVED it. Only downside is it has a slight fragrance to it, but otherwise amazing product! Looks great, lasts long without breaking up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my favorite stick foundation! I have dry skin and this does not feel drying at all. It has a velvety, blurring feel and look to it. Just wish they extend the shade range with better undertones

reviews.review_title: AMAZING Foundation Stick, a MUST Have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am completely obsessed with the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick! I have it in the shade 2,5 N Neutral and it is perfect ! It is so easy to apply, gives great coverage that is buildable, is super lightweight and just looks so flawless. I love the blurring effect it has, and that it is hydrating and super easy to blend. This is now my absolute favorite foundation I own, and will definitely continue purchasing it because I can’t live without it now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. First off the packaging is beautiful, and the product itself is very professional & gorgeous looking. This product has a great shade range for all skin tones, which I appreciate. This color in particular is perfect for me, and blends in seamlessly with my own skin tone. It provides medium coverage, but is buildable and gives off a matte finish that lasts all day. I love that it is in a stick form so it’s not only easy to apply, but less messy and more convenient to use. I don’t have any major issues with this product. It does exactly what it aims to do and you can tell at first glance that it is very good quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointing. My face is combo and I was expecting this foundation to last at least 4 hours without getting greasy. But it creased and separated within the 4 hours. I might add that I used a primer beforehand. It was an expensive mistake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation delivers a flawless, natural-to-matte with buildable medium to full coverage. I find that it’s easiest to blend with a brush. However, it may require a setting powder to prevent any potential transfer throughout the day. The shade 2.5N is a true light medium neutral.

reviews.review_title: Sure quick and on the go foundation hack!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation stick has medium coverage. The texture is a satin finish and the shade range was the perfect match! I am in the shade 3 N Neutral which is great for olive undertone and green veins. The packaging is a sleek and dark packaging with the Dior symbol. I give it a 4 1/2 out of 5 stars! Wasn’t a a huge fan of the fragrance of the foundation, only because I have very sensitive skin! But they had my exact shade which I am super happy, because it is rare that I find my shade! Thank you Dior! 🩵

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love it, it blends nicely with a brush but not too much with a beauty blender, the shade was a bit darker than i expected but i made it work perfectly. the texture is a little different at first but then it’s so light blended it that i forgot i even had makeup on. the finish is stunning!! it’s just not my favorite, it got little clumpy when i tried the beauty blender, but using a brush it’s perfect.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 0 N Neutral - very light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging and hydration of this product. Unfortunately it is definitely not pale girl friendly, it pulls very orange on my skin tone. If we got lighter shades, i’d really love this as a concealer

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 9 N Neutral - very deep skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received free for review from Influenster. Not my shade but I was going to attempt to use this as a bronzer/contour. It’s really nice sturdy packing. Nice natural finish and good coverage. There is a scent to beware of that but it’s nice. It’s pretty large so if using to conceal you’d have to apply to a brush first IMO because you can’t get really precise (under eye)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ✨Disclaimer✨Influnester has sent me this product for free in exchange for an honest review! I sadly chose the wrong shade, but my sister loves it. It’s so smooth, and the coverage is insane! The blend ability is smooth like butter! The packaging is too die for and it’s so sleek!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started to use this like concealer and has a good coverage, looking so natural and beautiful. The scent it’s delicious and I could blend so easy. The packaging it’s beautiful and easy to have in the bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I selected the wrong shade but it still worked for me because I was able to use it as a bronzer.  I am obsessed with Dior cosmetics!!! Instead of gliding it on my face I used a brush to swipe on the foundation stick and then stippled on my cheeks for a beautiful natural glowy finish. I had no issues with fading it stood in place all day. I love it! It’s definitely a multipurpose product!! Thanks to Influenster and Dior for sending me this product complementarily as a free sample for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I selected the wrong shade but it still worked for me because I was able to use it as a bronzer.  I am obsessed with Dior cosmetics!!! Instead of gliding it on my face I used a brush to swipe on the foundation stick and then stippled on my cheeks for a beautiful natural glowy finish. I had no issues with fading it stood in place all day. I love it! It’s definitely a multipurpose product!! reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am floored about how much I love this product. As somebody with extreme dry skin, I was skeptical about how this would work for me but it is perfect. It glides on, gives a great amount of coverage and absolutely does not dry out my skin or cause any patches etc (i have this issue with some other foundations). The packaging feels luxurious and heavy weight which I also love. I am cool toned with pale skin and the shade I received worked perfectly for my skin tone. I would definitely purchase this product on my own as I keep finding myself reaching for it over my other foundations or skin tints. 10/10!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am floored about how much I love this product. As somebody with extreme dry skin, I was skeptical about how this would work for me but it is perfect. It glides on, gives a great amount of coverage and absolutely does not dry out my skin or cause any patches etc (i have this issue with some other foundations). The packaging feels luxurious and heavy weight which I also love. I am cool toned with pale skin and the shade I received worked perfectly for my skin tone. I would definitely purchase this product on my own as I keep finding myself reaching for it over my other foundations or skin tints. 10/10!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2 N Neutral - light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick is very easy to apply and blend. It provides great coverage that’s light but you can apply more for more coverage. It has a light scent that smells great. The only downside is that I don’t feel like it’s long lasting and after a couple of hours it almost fades completely. I will try using a primer to see if there’s a noticeable difference.

reviews.review_title: I reach for it the most now!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from influenster and Dior in exchange for my honest opinion and review. I’m so in love with this product. It smooth and creamy and blendable. The stick makes for mess free application. Easy to take on the go and not worry about taking up space or busting a glass bottle. Medium buildable coverage. A Demi matte finish. It looks very pretty on the skin and works well with other products. I use shade 1N and am usually a fair neutral or a light ivory. I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the coverage and blendability of this foundation is insane! i love it so much! i wasn’t sure how i felt at first if im being honest and was skeptical that it was going to match my skin but it did! i love a foundation that looks like my skin and this nailed it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. The shade is just perfect for my skin tone. It glides smoothly over the skin and blends like a dream. Just don't overdo it with the amount, or it might feel a bit tacky. It has fragrance, but I don't mind. I love this. Top-notch product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product as part of an Influenster campaign for free in exchange for my honest review* LOVE this foundation! I have a very olive skin tone and find it hard to get a shade that matches my undertones but this one definitely does! The coverage is medium but buildable to full with a demi-matte finish. The packaging is gorgeous and I love the stick, it’s also very blendable and stays put for a long time! Highly recommend! Only thing is that it is scented like roses/floral so I would avoid if you’re sensitive to that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it was smooth when putting it on, it literally melts into your skin! It does cover a bit which is a plus! I love how sleek that packaging is which is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a stick foundation girl but I swatched this at a Dior counter and couldn’t believe it. Instant buy. Stupid buttery and blendable with buildable coverage. Applies seamlessly with brush or sponge.  I’m a heavy face sweater and with setting powder this held up unbelievably well after 8 hours of wear. It didn’t even transfer when I blotted with Kleenex! $70 for a foundation is not something I normally do but Dior complexion products hit out the park for me every time. If there’s one thing you splurge on, this won’t disappoint!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product. it looks great on the skin and blends well with my other makeup. there is no scent so that is good and the packaging is good for what you pay for

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: ***PURCHASED PRODUCT*** This is a stunning stick foundation. I have dry skin, it looks beautiful and does not cling to dry spots. The key is that you do not need a lot. If I use too much it can settle in my one smile line (made that mistake the first use), but using less and adding where I need just a bit more coverage has really worked beautifully. I do feel it's extremely buildable. You can get anywhere from light, full or solid medium coverage. The only downside is there's not much in the tube. I'm ok with that though because of how it enhances the skin. Just stunning and SO easy to blend with a damp sponge. It takes a lot to impress me - foundation-wise - but this one really is a stunner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously love this foundation stick. The packaging is much like a lipstick tube, in that you twist up and down. The scent is really nice, I can’t put my finger on what it is, but it’s a pleasant and familiar smell. The coverage is perfect. I love a full coverage product and it is definitely full coverage. I used my beauty blender, a brush and my fingers to blend and it was all easy. I would say I like the brush best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect! I am fair with neutral undertones and this does not pull orange or yellow. It’s so creamy, melts into your skin as you glide it on. Blends well with a brush or dampened beauty blender

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know this is a foundation, But I love using this as a bronzer. Adding this to my make up routine, it truly leaves my skin flawless. It’s very easy to blend and very buildable. The packaging is great. You do get a lot of product. I haven’t had a problem with this breaking on me or melting. This makes a awesome gift for anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Correct Concealer is a true game-changer in my makeup routine. From the first application, I could tell this was a high-quality product that lives up to its claims.  The formula is rich and creamy, yet it feels surprisingly lightweight on the skin. It offers full coverage that effectively conceals dark circles, blemishes, and any redness without looking cakey or heavy. The finish is natural and slightly luminous, giving my skin a flawless, airbrushed look that lasts all day.  What I love most about this concealer is its versatility. It’s buildable, so I can use it for everything from spot concealing to full-face coverage when I want a more polished look. It blends seamlessly, whether I’m using a brush, sponge, or my fingers, and it doesn’t settle into fine lines or crease throughout the day.  The staying power is impressive as well. Once it’s on, it doesn’t budge, even in humid conditions or after a long day. I also appreciate that it’s infused with skincare benefits like wild pansy extract, which keeps my skin hydrated and comfortable.  The packaging is elegant and functional, with a doe-foot applicator that allows for precise application. A little goes a long way, so the product lasts quite a while, making it worth the investment.

reviews.review_text: I have been using the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick in shade 3.5N, and it has been fantastic. The shade matches my skin tone perfectly (a light-ish tan/medium), blending in smoothly for a natural look. It does a great job of blurring imperfections and covering breakouts.  I find it easy to apply – I just use it on specific areas of my face and blend with a brush or makeup sponge. It gives my skin a youthful appearance that I love. The finish is smooth and natural, never looking cakey or heavy.  The packaging is sleek and convenient, making it easy to carry around for touch-ups during the day. Plus, the scent is amazing and adds a nice touch to my routine.  I never really liked using foundation until now, but this product is perfect for me. If you’re looking for something that offers great coverage without feeling heavy, I highly recommend the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick.

reviews.review_title: Holds its shape, after sitting in extreme heat
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation stick although the shade I chose is a little too dark for me. I chose it thinking I would use it for when I get spray tans as I need a good foundation stick to wear. It blends well, it’s smooth like butter against the skin, and it lasted several days in my mailbox during the intense heat we had without melting. That alone gets my vote. I kept forgetting to grab it out of my mailbox, and finally when I did, I was surprised that its shape was still in tact. It would be perfect for someone who does their makeup in the car like I do. It does smell a bit perfume-y, so I wouldn’t recommend it to someone who is avoiding scented cosmetics. Other than that it’s great. Would try it in my true shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I own all Dior foundations and I have to say, this BY FAR is my FAVORITE. The shade range is smaller than the other foundation lines, I usually wear 2WO , but this one does not carry it so I went with 2.5n which was perfect a little lighter but nothing that bronzer can't fix, plus it will work perfectly for winter. I didn't go with 2W Because it looked a bit to warm. Other than that I LOVE this foundation and will repurchase.

reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation. It’s very easy to use and the shade matches my skin tone perfectly . The packaging is very cute. the texture is very smooth  and it’s  blend able. It’s gives continuous hydration and stays for a long time. Amazing quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this product. It glides on flawlessly and blends in well. My only issue is that the shade is a little too light for my skin at the moment, but will be perfect for the winter. It is a medium to high coverage. Depending on how much you use. Overall I would recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised when I first swiped this foundation stick onto my face because it just seemed to disappear - I didn't expect such a perfect match (shade 2N). A little goes a long way, but this foundation doesn't leave my face looking cakey and unnatural. I thought it would really settle into fine lines/creases and cling to dry patches a lot worse than a liquid foundation does, but that hasn't been the case.  I've tried applying it with a brush, my fingertips, and a sponge.  When applying with fingertips, it sometimes pills on my fingers, but blends effortlessly into my face and seems to melt right into my skin.  I've worn it as a concealer, using just a little bit where coverage was needed, and also have worn it as a full-faced foundation. The coverage is definitely buildable.  I think I prefer applying it only where I need it, instead of to my full face, especially during really hot summer days. It's such a good match that the edges just disappear, you can't tell where the makeup ends and my skin begins.  It seems to hold up well in humidity and while sweating, especially when using a primer. It does transfer a bit, but not nearly as much as some of the other foundations I've used.  I'm enjoying this foundation a lot more than I thought I would and I look forward to doing my makeup now because it's such a simple process compared to my normal makeup routine. Perfect for summer, perfect for travel....I've finally found a foundation that I love and will absolutely be recommending this to friends. I will be purchasing a new stick when this one is all used up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So many good things about this but what I love the most is the packaging. It is absolutely amazing! The packaging is sleek and clean cut and it’s small enough to fit in even the smallest of bags. I really like the shade I got and like the way it goes on. It gave me good coverage all day. It’s also nice to have a concealer, corrector and foundation all in one. This went in smoothly and did not feel too heavy like other foundations. It lasted all day for me and blurred my pores very well even without a setting powder.

reviews.review_title: Too creamy for my oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this foundation stick and found it to be a mixed bag. The coverage is decent, providing medium to full opacity, but the finish was a bit problematic. While the product is quite creamy, it ended up being too oily for my already oily skin, which made it feel heavy and greasy throughout the day.  In terms of packability, it’s very convenient and perfect for on-the-go application. The blending was smooth and easy, which is a plus. The scent was pleasant, though it neither added to nor detracted from the product's performance. Overall, while it might work for those with drier skin types, it wasn't ideal for me. I’d rate it 3 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s such a beautiful stick but the shade was off. I recommend this stick for those who like coverage and don’t mind fragrances. It does a good job at covering acne and marks. Very easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this foundation,  but I'm sad to say I've tried it a few times and I just don't like it. I find it settles into my pores and gives me texture. I had better results when I used a primer and setting spray to help reduce the texture but I still see it. It does perform well and is a buildable formula. Also a little goes a long way which is another plus. I don't think I would buy this stick formula again. I received this product from influenster in exchange for my honest review.

Even after exfoliating I found it sat on top of my skin, went patchy on my nose and cheeks and clung to what little peach fuzz I have.  Settled into my very fine lines too.  I would not recommended this if you have sensitive skin as the perfume is overwhelming.

reviews.review_text: The Dior foundation stick is an interesting product as I have not used a foundation stick before. It glides easily on my skin and provides good coverage. The foundation fills in my pores and helps with my skin tone. I chose my shade based on my experience with other brands and it turns out to be a good match.   The coverage is sufficient and lasts relatively long. I was outside for 4 hours in the sun, sweating and all, but my makeup still looked ok. The stick is a new and interesting concept, although I do have some concerns about hygiene because it directly touches my skin. But overall I would still recommend it.  I received the product from Influensters in exchange for my review.

I chose the shade based on my experience with other products and it seems accurate. The foundation fills in my pores and lasts relatively long. After being outside for 4 hours I think my makeup still looked good and did not become cakey.  The design is new and innovative. I have not used a foundation stick before and find the idea interesting. However, I also have concerns about hygiene issues with a stick since it directly touches my skin.   I received the product from Influenster in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the forever skin perfect. It had a very nice coverage and was super easy to blend. I loved the packaging that it came with and I liked how it was refillable. It makes me feel good knowing that I can make less waste. It is scented so keep that in mind if you don’t like scented products. I highly recommend it though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently switched to Dior Foundation, and I must say it has completely surpassed my expectations. This is hands down one of the best foundations I have ever used. The coverage is flawless, blending seamlessly into my skin and providing a natural, radiant finish that lasts all day.  The first thing that struck me about Dior Foundation was its lightweight formula. It feels incredibly comfortable on the skin, almost as if I'm not wearing any makeup at all. This is a huge improvement over my previous foundation, which often felt heavy and cakey after a few hours. Dior Foundation stays put without settling into fine lines or creasing, which is a game-changer for me.  Another standout feature is its buildable coverage. Whether I'm going for a light, everyday look or a full glam finish, Dior Foundation delivers. It evens out my skin tone perfectly and covers any imperfections without looking unnatural. The finish is smooth and slightly dewy, giving my complexion a healthy, glowing appearance.  I also appreciate the range of shades available, making it easy to find a perfect match for my skin tone. It blends effortlessly, whether I use a brush, sponge, or even my fingers. Plus, it doesn't oxidize throughout the day, so the color stays true from morning to night.  Overall, Dior Foundation has become my go-to product, effortlessly replacing my old favorite. Its superior formula, excellent coverage, and beautiful finish make it a must-have in my makeup routine. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable, high-quality foundation that delivers stunning results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation positively surprised me. I have been dealing with acne and dry skin. Therefore, also dark spots and redness because of the acne healing. This stuff covered it up beautifully!! It didn't cling to my blemishes, and it blurred out my pores and sebaceous filaments on my nose. The finish was natural looking on me and seemed very smooth and also fairly matte. It held up well for a few hours, but I have really oily skin now with the summer heat, so after maybe 4 or 5 hours I applied some quick powder to get rid of the slight oiliness. It is so easy to apply, especially when you are on the go. I recommend blending it out with a fluffy brush, but it also turned out fine with just my fingers. The product goes down the silver metal part. Nothing is in the black part of the packaging. I think that's a fair amount with how little you need.

It would be perfect for someone on the go who does their makeup in the car like I do. It does smell a bit perfume-y, so I wouldn’t recommend it to someone who is avoiding scented cosmetics. Other than that it’s great. Would try it in my true shade.

Despite the higher price point, the Dior Foundation Stick's performance and convenience make it a fantastic investment for anyone looking for a reliable, high-quality foundation. reviews.review_text: One of the standout features of this foundation stick is its creamy and blendable formula. It glides smoothly onto the skin, making it easy to apply and blend. The texture is lightweight, allowing for buildable coverage without feeling heavy or cakey.  The Dior Skin Perfect Foundation Stick also offers impressive staying power. It stays put throughout the day, without the need for frequent touch-ups. This is particularly beneficial for those with oily or combination skin types.  Another notable aspect of this foundation stick is its shade range. Dior offers a wide range of shades to cater to various skin tones. This ensures that you can find a perfect match for your complexion, resulting in a seamless and natural look.  The packaging of the Dior Skin Perfect Foundation Stick is sleek and travel-friendly. The stick format makes it easy to carry in your purse or makeup bag, allowing for quick touch-ups on the go.  Overall, the Dior Skin Perfect Foundation Stick is a high-quality product that delivers on its promises. It provides excellent coverage, a natural finish, and long-lasting wear. If you're in search of a foundation stick that offers convenience without compromising on quality, this is definitely one to consider.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YOU NEED THIS!! Dior Dior Dior whew I have not been this excited for about a foundation ever I don't believe. First off, the packaging is timeless, chic and sleek I cannot wait to take this on my upcoming trip. Now let's get into the product, I matched the stick to my Forever Glow Foundation shade, which is 6W, so this stick is flexible meant to match a variety of shades across the various Dior foundation lines. I was skeptical but nevertheless I followed the color chart, and it definitely worked! Once blended I was left with the most beautiful natural skin like finish not too matte not too dewy it was as if I just had a great skin care regime and to have that much coverage and to still look that natural it CRAXZZY. I asked my fiancé how it looked, and he responded that had I not told him I was wearing foundation he would not have known. Just to make sure the lightning wasn't playing tricks on me, I photographed outside on a sunny day and same thing just beautiful flawless skin! I applied the Dior Contour stick; Charlotte Tilbury Flawless Finish powder the Dior filter glow on top and all these things were not needed I was basically experimenting on how well the foundation played with other products and wore this for the day which was hot and humid. I'd say I wore at least 10 hours at the end I legit did not want to wash my face off. This review is long because I want the ladies to try this. Honestly this is going to be my forever foundation I hope and pray that the only thing they do is add more shades other than that PLEASE DO NOT change this formula!!  I'm buying a backup maybe two just to be sure I'm not without it that's how much I love this stuff. Try it ladies you won't regret!

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the DIOR Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick in the shade 1N Neutral. Overall, I would rate this product four stars out of five. Shade: The 1N Neutral shade was a tad too dark for my complexion. I also found that the 0N shade, as pictured by the company, appeared practically white on their company photo of all the shades. This made finding the perfect match a bit challenging. Moisturization: While the foundation provided a nice finish, it did not feel as moisturizing as I had hoped, but nonetheless was so beautiful on the skin! I just happen to have dry skin so I lean for more moisturizing products.  Overall Performance: Despite these minor issues, the foundation itself is very nice and luxurious. It offers good coverage and blends well, making it a solid choice for those looking for a reliable foundation stick. I hope this feedback is helpful for future product improvements. Thank you, DIOR, for your continued commitment to quality. The packaging is adorable and is on my display!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m normally a powder foundation kinda girl, but this Dior foundation stick has changed that and I’m never looking back. I love that as soon as you blend the foundation in, it gives your skin a blurred finish and makes it feel so hydrated. I was amazed at the coverage and how it evened out my complexion. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Starting off with the packaging, super beautiful & adorned with the signature CD which I love! As for the formula, although it wasn’t my shade, it was both creamy and hydrating. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I should start off by saying this is my first time using a foundation stick, and I wasn’t sure what to expect or how to use it. To my surprise, it was very easy to apply and blend seamlessly into my skin.  To truly gauge its performance, I applied the Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation stick without any primer. My T-zone tends to be dry, while the rest of my face is normal to combination. Applying 2-3 swatches across my cheeks, nose, chin, and forehead provided ample coverage that blended beautifully. However, I ended up applying a bit too much, resulting in a slightly cakey feel on my skin—this was more due to my application technique than the makeup itself.  Notably, the dry areas of my T-zone did experience some pulling, suggesting that using a hydrating primer or ensuring a well-moisturized skin beforehand would be beneficial. Even so, the foundation did impressively minimize my pores and conceal hyperpigmentation around my face.  The finish of the Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation stick is dewy and quite beautiful, imparting a filtered, radiant look to the skin—perfect for those wanting a naturally luminous complexion.  Sensitive individuals will appreciate that this foundation is fragrance-free, catering to those with fragrance sensitivities or preferences for unscented products.  The stick packaging is exceptionally convenient for travel and touch-ups, and as depicted in the attached photo, the product quantity is generous, ensuring longevity and value for money.  The Dior Forever Skin Perfect foundation stick offers ease of application, impressive coverage, and a radiant finish. While it may require a bit of experimentation to find the ideal application technique for different skin types, its travel-friendly design and skin-enhancing properties make it a worthy addition to any makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For full disclosure, I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.  When this first arrived, I was so excited to try this out that I tested this on my bare skin. And when I say bare skin, I mean absolutely no skincare products or skin prep. Imagine my surprise when I was impressed to see how this performed. The foundation stick glided onto my bare face with complete ease, the creaminess of the formula was an immediate notice. I wasn’t sure how much to use, and didn’t want to use a lot as this was for mere excitement testing purposes. I didn’t need a lot of the formula to provide a full coverage experience. I simply used a beauty blender to blend, noting that it blended effortlessly. I was shook at my reflection. My bare skin. My bare dry skin. And it looked amazing. I couldn’t wait to use this legitimately, with my skincare routine and prep! You just know you have found something special when it performs that well on bare skin.   Since then, I’ve used it as I would any of my foundations. I’m in absolute awe of how my skin looks with this formula. The formula feels really nice on the skin. Feels almost natural, like I’m wearing nothing despite the insane coverage. My skin still looks like skin, but far more better. The appearance of my pores was noticeably minimized. My skin is naturally dry, so I’m happy to that this formula is hydrating. There’s no caked appearance. The formula provides an ideal version of my skin’s appearance. This stays perfectly intact throughout these hot, summer days where sweat is of the norm.   This would be a perfect foundation for me if there was SPF in it. I say that as someone who already has SPF incorporated in their routine. However, in the foundation market that is highly saturated with options varying all over the spectrum in terms of pricing, there are a lot of foundations that are a fraction of the price that offer SPF.   This is a pleasant introduction to a foundation product from Dior. I see that the hyp

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this forever skin perfect foundation! It’s so easy to apply just glides onto the face. It has buildable coverage and blends very easily. I’ve worn it all day and it lasts throughout my day with no problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I'm not a big fan of foundation sticks, but this product applied and blended so smoothly and left me with a slightly matte, air-brushed finish. It didn't feel heavy or cakey on my skin, or feel greasy during or after application. It gives good coverage without being too heavy.  However, I have one gripe about the actual product, and that is that it is scented. I do NOT like having scented makeup products, and this has a powdery, floral scent to it. Granted, it's not super strong or overpowering, but I still don't want that all over my face.  Second, I unfortunately received the 3N shade which ended up being too dark for my skin, and also very warm, in my opinion, not neutral. This may work for me as a sort of contour or bronzer, but I'm bummed this doesn't work for my normal foundation shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

Wasn’t a a huge fan of the fragrance of the foundation, only because I have very sensitive skin! But they had my exact shade which I am super happy, because it is rare that I find my shade! Thank you Dior! 🩵

Overall, it's a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a high-quality foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. When I received the product the outside packaging and tube was fine, but when I opened it the bullet of foundation wasn’t secured in the tube and the foundation got everywhere as shown in the photo. I believe for this product you can buy a refill and that’s why it easily pops out. Keep that in mind when purchasing online, I would recommend buying in person. The formula itself is pretty easy to work with, the foundation doesn’t have much play time so I recommend applying in sections and blending as you go. I found brush application to work the best. Finish is a soft matte/natural finish. The product works well with all of my other products and it stayed put pretty well. Most stick foundations can look cakey in my opinion, but this one really melts into the skin. The foundation has fragrance, which doesn’t bother my skin (and I like the scent!). I would recommend this product if you’re looking for a high end foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage of this foundation is great and a little goes a very long way. I use this Dior foundation for contouring and it blends out so well with a beauty blender. The scent is light and quickly dissipated so it’s great for people who are sensitive to synthetic fragrances. I was not a huge fan of the plastic packaging because you can feel it creak in your hands. I’m very sure that the packaging will not last long if you’re not careful with it. It works like a push pop where the only way to dispense more product is to push up. In addition, my product fell out of the case many times before bc it just sits on top of the tube instead of being secure. I don’t know how I feel about a Dior logo stamp underneath the cap so that you can always “restamp” the logo onto the stick after using. It’s tacky, cheap and messy. It doesn’t feel luxurious at all and I will not recommend this product nor re-purchase after finishing.

Granted, it's not super strong or overpowering, but I still don't want that all over my face.  Second, I got the 3N shade which ended up being too dark and warm toned for my skin. This may work for me as a sort of contour, but I'm bummed this doesn't work for my normal foundation shade.
I love this product. Such a nice foundation with a beautiful finish. Makes my skin look so good. The packaging is nice too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Dior Foundation Stick! It's a luxurious and versatile addition to my makeup routine. The sleek, travel-friendly packaging makes it super convenient for on-the-go use. The creamy, blendable formula provides buildable coverage, from sheer to full, without ever feeling heavy on my skin. I adore the natural, radiant finish that enhances my skin's glow and maintains a smooth appearance without settling into fine lines or pores. It's long-lasting and works well with my combination skin, though I do use a setting powder to control shine. The shade range is pretty good, though it could be even more inclusive. Despite the higher price point, the Dior Foundation Stick's performance and convenience make it a fantastic investment for anyone looking for a reliable, high-quality foundation. Has a tiny natural scent! Amazing I fell in love!! I added a reference photo of how it looks being worn!

The finish is natural and radiant, giving me a healthy glow that lasts all day.  Applying this foundation is a breeze thanks to its sleek packaging and stick form. It's easy to control the amount I need, which minimizes product waste compared to liquid foundations. It's also perfect for travel with no risk of spills or leaks. It just smells fresh and not overpowering   Overall, if you're looking for a foundation that delivers excellent coverage, feels luxurious on your skin, and is convenient to use, the Dior foundation stick is a fantastic choice!

reviews.review_text: pros and cons to this one! for the pros:  - it is very hydrating for a stick foundation. it feels soft when you put it on, and it didn’t cling to any of my dry patches - the packaging is gorgeous - it has a nice, lightly glowy finish - it is buildable  cons:  - all dior shades run so yellow! i found this with the backstage foundation as well. it makes it hard to get a good shade match if you’re not a warm undertone - it didn’t have a lot of lasting powder. i set with setting powder and setting spray and found that it was gone by the end of the day. on the plus side, it didnt separate or look bad— it just wasn’t on my face anymore. i would want more lasting power from a foundation this expensive— especially since i am someone with dry skin and i’d imagine it’d be worse if you were oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging for the Dior forever skin perfect stick foundation is beautiful. You twist the product up and you can twist it back down as well. Product has skincare ingredients in the formula which I person love! Foundation feels silky going on and has a medium finish. Product comes in 18 shades and 2 different finishes natural and semimat per website. I used a foundation brush to blend out the product giving me a light medium coverage. Product blends smoothly onto skin. Product feels lightweight on skin and does seem to blur out pores. It does have a fragrance typical Dior fragrance, doesn’t bother me. With just 1 layer I get light medium coverage and does not emphasize texture. Does build up to a medium coverage without being patchy. Has a really beautiful soft glow and natural finish. I have dry skin and don’t find the need to powder my face. Foundation wore very well during the day and has great lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For full disclosure, I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.  When this first arrived, I was so excited to try this out that I tested this on my bare skin. And when I say bare skin, I mean absolutely no skincare products or skin prep. Imagine my surprise when I was impressed to see how this performed. The foundation stick glided onto my bare face with complete ease, the creaminess of the formula was an immediate notice. I wasn’t sure how much to use, and didn’t want to use a lot as this was for mere excitement testing purposes. I didn’t need a lot of the formula to provide a full coverage experience. I simply used a beauty blender to blend, noting that it blended effortlessly. I was shook at my reflection. My bare skin. My bare dry skin. And it looked amazing. I couldn’t wait to use this legitimately, with my skincare routine and prep! You just know you have found something special when it performs that well on bare skin.   Since then, I’ve used it as I would any of my foundations. I’m in absolute awe of how my skin looks with this formula. The formula feels really nice on the skin. Feels almost natural, like I’m wearing nothing despite the insane coverage. My skin still looks like skin, but far more better. The appearance of my pores was noticeably minimized. My skin is naturally dry, so I’m happy to that this formula is hydrating. There’s no caked appearance. The formula provides an ideal version of my skin’s appearance. This stays perfectly intact throughout these hot, summer days where sweat is of the norm.   This would be a perfect foundation for me if there was SPF in it. I say that as someone who already has SPF incorporated in their routine. However, in the foundation market that is highly saturated with options varying all over the spectrum in terms of pricing, there are a lot of foundations that are a fraction of the price that offer SPF.  This is a pleasant introduction to a foundation product from Dior.

reviews.review_text: I have combination skin type this foundation stick works great. It’s buildable, I’d say with a natural finish. The stick is not super soft so you don’t have to worry about applying too much.

But overall, I’m in love with this foundation and the coverage. It definitely is very high coverage and matte finish. I unfortunately think I got the wrong shade, but I am able to brighten it up with concealer and it is good. I love Dior products and if you also love Dior products you will definitely fall in love with this product!
