reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first got this foundation, I wasn’t sure I would like it because I’ve never really use stick foundations because I assume that they are full coverage which is not my style. Man was I surprised with this foundation stick! I put a couple swipes on my face and then blended it out with a damp beauty blender, and it just melted into my skin like butter. it is completely undetectable on the skin and gives a natural  finish. Overtime throughout the day, the coverage remains the same, which I would say is medium buildable. however, I do get a  oily throughout the day. This foundation really just looks like skin from the beginning of the day until the very end. I don’t mind that it gets oily because I prefer a dewy/natural look anyway. One thing people might not like is this does have a very strong fragrance, which is common in luxury makeup.  And of course, like with all Dior packaging, it is gorgeous.￼I was so pleasantly surprised with this foundation, and I look forward to continuing to use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful packaging, convenient stick. Easy to apply on the face and blend. The texture is very delicate and creamy. Matte finish, full coverage. It has a smell that I didn't really like. I put it 4 stars because I don't like the feeling on my face after applying this product. Once again, I wouldn't have purchased this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Dior Forever Skin perfect foundation stick free from Influenster and Dior in exchange for my honest opinion.  Dior is one of my main foundations in rotation each day, so needless to say, I was thrilled at the chance to try this foundation stick before it's even launched in stores.  The packaging is attractive with a fancy snap lid cover with a decorative silver topped cap.  The scent is Dior's typical signature scent, which is a floral smell.  It fades quickly upon application, but I don't mind the scent.  On the box, it doesn't say which application method is preferred, so I tried it using a brush and then my fingers to see which application worked best. A brush, in my opinion, sheers it out too much as it is very emollient. My fingers worked best as it gave me more control of the coverage.  It is buildable.   The shade was a bit too dark, but  I had to pick an available shade, and it was the lightest available to choose.  I pictured two swatches for comparison. The first swatch is the Dior Forever liquid foundarion in 0CR, and the second is the new foundation stick in 2CR. You can see a huge difference in the color, but fortunately for me, it's a great summer shade for when I self tan.  Once I applied it, though, I was able to sheer it out enough to where it didn't look bad.  It does have decent coverage and camouflaged my pores well, which is a deal breaker for me if it doesn't.  It is very emollient and gives a natural glow. It borders on matte but does have a radiance to it without giving the glazed donut look.  It did last all day long and stayed in place. Blush, bronzer and concealer played well with it.  I think I'd be happier if I got my actual color, but I must say, it's a nice foundation. You can't go wrong with Dior. Will definitely swatch in store once it makes its debut.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the forever skin perfect. It had a very nice coverage and was super easy to blend. I loved the packaging that it came with and I liked how it was refillable. It makes me feel good knowing that I can make less waste. It is scented so keep that in mind if you don’t like scented products. I highly recommend it though!

It blends like a dream but might be a little drying for my skin type (extremely dry skin). The shade range is decent but could be better and more extensive. My shade looked a little lighter when applied on my face versus inside the stick. The packaging is really annoying too, wish they would simplify it. I would not be able to justify the price for the quality of this. I have a lot of redness though that I feel it evened out, really great if you’re a minimal makeup person like me and don’t have super dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the dior foundation stick! I actually got one a couple shades darker than my skin tone so I could use it as a contour instead. The formula is super creamy and pigmented. I prefer to apply the product with a brush and then blend it out for more control. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who is looking to explore luxury make up products. I also received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dior Forever Skin Perfect offers moderate coverage and a smooth, natural finish, though it doesn't last all day. It blends well and has a pleasant, mild scent, but the packaging feels less luxurious than expected. Overall, it's a good product but not outstanding.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely amazing, I love the coverage and how easy is to apply. This is very hydrating and does not look cakey or anything. It is so smooth and blends very easily. It is also super easy to take this on the go and apply. This has transformed my make up routine and I can’t recommend this enough. I received this complimentary in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Dior forever skin perfect is a beautifully compact foundation stick that comes in a very sleek package with nice silver detailing on top. The formula is super creamy, blendable and feels quite hydrating on the skin rather than cakey or heavy. I am very fair skinned with cooler undertones and received the shade 1C and it’s perfect. This is one of the best foundation sticks I’ve ever used. It blends well and has pretty good staying power without the need for reapplication or powder to dab any oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great buildable stick foundation. Its creamy and easy to blent. I really like that it can be worked up with for full coverage. It has a soft clean like scent that isn’t overpowering or annoying. I like how it is in a stick compact so you can easily choose a different shade for bronzer/contour. So far its been a lovely product to work with.   *I received this product from Influenster and brand in exchange for my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Dior Foundation Stick! It's a luxurious and versatile addition to my makeup routine. The sleek, travel-friendly packaging makes it super convenient for on-the-go use. The creamy, blendable formula provides buildable coverage, from sheer to full, without ever feeling heavy on my skin. I adore the natural, radiant finish that enhances my skin's glow and maintains a smooth appearance without settling into fine lines or pores. It's long-lasting and works well with my combination skin, though I do use a setting powder to control shine. The shade range is pretty good, though it could be even more inclusive. Despite the higher price point, the Dior Foundation Stick's performance and convenience make it a fantastic investment for anyone looking for a reliable, high-quality foundation. Has a tiny natural scent, which smells amazing! I included a photo of the foundation being worn for an event for reference in the coverage! Amazing I fell in love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Dior Foundation Stick! It's a luxurious and versatile addition to my makeup routine. The sleek, travel-friendly packaging makes it super convenient for on-the-go use. The creamy, blendable formula provides buildable coverage, from sheer to full, without ever feeling heavy on my skin. I adore the natural, radiant finish that enhances my skin's glow and maintains a smooth appearance without settling into fine lines or pores. It's long-lasting and works well with my combination skin, though I do use a setting powder to control shine. The shade range is pretty good, though it could be even more inclusive. Despite the higher price point, the Dior Foundation Stick's performance and convenience make it a fantastic investment for anyone looking for a reliable, high-quality foundation. Has a tiny natural scent! Amazing I fell in love!! I included a photo of me wearing the foundation for reference on the coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product I. Exchange for my honest review. WOW! Ok so, my regular “foundation” is a skintint. I don’t like full coverage. I think it makes my face look cakey and bumpy. I use a skin tint because my face is typically acne free and a skin tint and concealer is all I need. Well, I got this foundation stuck in the mail and omg! I used it as a concealer and for little touch ups here and there and it was perfect. Thank Gd, I chose the correct color. It made my skin velvety and not too slick and shiny (I prefer a matte nonshiny look.) I didn’t even have to go in for powder hours later. I get oily on my nose but that was to be expected.  For the price tag, I’d say if you can splurge, do it. If you’re going to put this all over your face in a heavy amount, I’d say don’t buy it. A little definitely goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging for the Dior forever skin perfect stick foundation is beautiful. You twist the product up and you can twist it back down as well. Product has skincare ingredients in the formula which I person love! Foundation feels silky going on and has a medium finish. Product comes in 18 shades and 2 different finishes natural and semimat per website. I used a foundation brush to blend out the product giving me a light medium coverage. Product blends smoothly onto skin. Product feels lightweight on skin and does seem to blur out pores. It does have a fragrance typical Dior fragrance, doesn’t bother me. With just 1 layer I get light medium coverage and does not emphasize texture. Does build up to a medium coverage without being patchy. Has a really beautiful soft glow and natural finish. I have dry skin and don’t find the need to powder my face. Foundation wore very well during the day and has great lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Dior has done it again guys!!! I’m so excited for this, I love this so much I use it every day. It blends perfectly well with my skin and doesn’t cake, super smooth and creamy texture, with full coverage guys….. the packaging is very cute, and they have a lot of shade, so make sure you find your exact skin shade, I love it and you would too…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick was life changing honestly! It’s has amazing coverage and texture! It stays on for DAYS if you don’t take it off LOL!! The shade range is wonderful as well! And it blends so so easy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this foundation. I have oily skin and a stick is perfect for it. Glides on and blends so smoothly. No scent either so good for sensitive skin. I recieved this complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: A must have for ALL SKIN TYPES in any weather!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skin Perfect is an understatement - this is like second skin with full coverage of all flaws. I’m a foundation snob because I have combination, maturing skin - & this is EVERYTHING I need. I received this in the middle of heatwave in NYC; & this has withstood intense humidity and extreme heat ALL DAY! I don’t know what type of magic formula this is, but it’s hands down the best thing I’ve ever used. I usually use skin tints in the summer; but this is so lightweight, it’s better than a tint. A little goes a long way and it provides FULL coverage. I accidentally chose a color that was a bit lighter than my skin (1CR) and it blends like a dream. I don’t know how it manages to blend into my skin so seamlessly. I’ve used it with my fingers, a sponge, and a brush and it all works beautifully. I used it with and without a primer and it’s just magic. My skin looks flawless like I’m walking around with a blurring filter. It hydrates my skin, while giving me a matte finish. The way it blurs pores by my nose and all my little lines is straight sorcery. It’s a glowing natural finish that also conceals and brightens. It’s ideal for no-makeup makeup looks; but is also buildable for a stunning full glam look. This is worth every cent! The luxurious, gorgeous tube it comes in, is the cherry on top. Dior does it again with beauty excellence. This one was gifted free for my review, but I intend on getting color matched and using this regularly. It’s a MUST have for warmer weather! I can’t recommend this foundation stick enough!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for spot concealing or a normal foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super light weight and medium coverage! You can definitely make it light coverage or let it be more medium. What I really liked about this product is you can use it as concealer and it covers nicely.  It’s also super easy to blend out. I have been using this more as a spot concealer for acne and it works so well. Honestly I have no complaints. It is Dior so it is a higher price point. If you love luxury makeup it’s for you. If you don’t want to spend a lot on makeup this isn’t something you need to buy. It’s nice and I really love it but it isn’t life changing.

reviews.review_title: It blends in like butter and has full coverage!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay! This is actually my new favorite foundation! wow, this foundation feels like butter when applying and it has full coverage! it blends sooo easily, this is perfect for a girl like me that is always on the go, i love how compact this foundation stick is!, you can just stick it in your purse and do a quick touch up before going in the gym or to the store.. i will definitely be buying this when i run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the creamy texture of the foundation however, there is an extreme fragrance that I do not like. I prefer no fragrance in my face products to prevent any breakouts. I do like the coverage this gets plus you do not have to use much. It was easy to blend on my face and the packaging is so cute!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is not full but definitely blurs out your skin the finish is matte blends like butter packaging is very luxurious the sent is not to strong but definitely has a sent to it!￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation stick is stunning! The packaging, the formula are chefs kiss! It’s compact and perfect carrying around in my purse. It has a wonderful scent that isn’t overpowering nor do you smell it once it’s on your skin. It blends like a dream even with my finger tips. It looks and feels like skin. It’s light weight with great coverage. I will be purchasing more. Perfect shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice, lightweight but buildable foundation! It’s blends out like a dream and the packaging is very hefty and nice. It feel luxurious on the face and it looks luxurious. Smells pleasant but not too strong!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off this is a buildable coverage. For the people who are looking for something that can go from the daily to a more dramatic look this is it. Creamy texture, not overbearing or overheavy decent shade range, and love the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If your looking for a foundation that will last all day without messing up the Dior Forever Skin Perfect is a must try. The foundation stick glides so perfectly on the skin leaving a natural, radiant look all day while also providing your skin with moisture. The coverage is amazing and it can easily be blended into the skin. The packaging is so classic and nice , I’m personally fan of the simplicity of the just the black component with the D in the middle to represent Dior. The only part I didn’t like about the packaging is how fingerprints are easily left behind making it easy for it to get dirty. The reason I gave it a 4 star instead of a 5 star is the shade range. If your dark complexion you might find it harder to find a shade since Dior only release 5 dark skin colors, I took one star off because of the lack of inclusivity. I honestly believe Dior is a multi million dollar company that could have afforded to release a wider shade range to fit everyone skin tone.  •I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion•

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love anything Dior! I received the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Stick Foundation. It is a beautiful light to medium finish. It’s long wearing yet very hydrating. I am in the shade 1 neutral, which is perfect for my fair to light complexion. I also wear 1 neutral in several other products that I have from Dior from foundation to concealer, and I find the shade range to be the same for me. This creates a beautiful luminous yet matte finish. What I love about this is that it contains skincare ingredients. This does contain fragrance which personally I love but if you are sensitive to fragrance, you might want to try this out in the store first. I also love that this is portable and fits in my handbag perfectly and I can take it on the go. This will definitely be a new staple in my routine!

The packaging was nice but when I opened it the entire foundation stick popped out but I was able to put it back together. This foundation did have a nice smell to it which was a surprise. Unfortunately I chose 7N thinking it would be a great match but it was just one shade too dark for me. Other than that the consistency of the foundation was great and did blend out really nicely. I just wished I had chosen the right shade. It’s too dark for my skin complexion and and unfortunately just a bit too light to be used as a contour

And one little thing that I do not like is that it is a 0.35 ounce bottle it’s not even one ounce ￼￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay wow - I was intrigued by this product and have never used a foundation stick before so I was a little skeptical about how fast it would dry and how well it would blend. This is seriously my new fav foundation - it blends sooo smoothly and seamlessly with a beauty blender. The shade match is PERFECT for me and is not too warm or cold undertone-wise but perfectly neutral. It lasted all day and my other products like cream blush and contour did not cause this product to pill or lift. I love how buildable it is too and would describe it as medium to light coverage depending how much you use. Gorgeous luxurious packaging as always!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This little bottle does wonders! It provides full coverage for 24hr and a smooth finish. Easy to blend and matches the shade of my skin perfectly. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect Multi-Use Foundation Stick is a true skincare gem. Its soft, lightweight texture effortlessly blends into the skin, providing continuous hydration and a barely-there feel. With 24 hours of comfort, it’s perfect for those long days. Whether you’re aiming for a natural look or building up coverage, this stick delivers. Plus, it’s available in a wide range of shades, making it suitable for various skin tones. If you’re seeking a versatile foundation that lets your skin breathe, Dior Forever Skin Perfect is a solid choice! You can carry in your purse anywhere.

reviews.review_title: Heavy fragrance and not suitable for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade 1N and it’s too dark for me, I guess I would have to go with shade 0. It looks like the jump from shades 0 to 1 is pretty big as well. This has a strong floral perfume scent when applying it so I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone sensitive to fragrance. I don’t know that it will be good for every skin type, I think it will give people with dry skin a lot of texture, it definitely exaggerates my dry patches and makes certain parts of my skin look worse. It has really nice coverage it will do a good job covering up discoloration and hyperpigmentation and even out the complexion. I believe this retails for around 100 dollars which is a huge step up from their other foundations. I don’t think it is better than the other luxury options that are less expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how smooth and easy to blend this foundation stick is. Since this shade is darker than my skin tone, I’m using it for contouring. I love how hydrating yet natural looking it leaves my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is so sleek and easy to hold although mine did come apart when first opening. The formula is nice and smooth. The color is a bit darker for my liking but it can easily be adjusted.

reviews.review_title: The perfect foundation stick for soft glam looks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of this Dior foundation is superb. The coverage is lightweight but full coverage. My skin looked natural and smooth. The foundation has a pleasant smell. I was able to easily blend the foundation with my under eye concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very grateful to try out this product. It glides like butter and covers my imperfections. It is definitely medium to full coverage. By far a perfect match for the summer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 4 N Neutral - medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dior Forever Skin Perfect in shade 6N is a game-changer for my makeup routine. The formula is incredibly lightweight, yet it provides flawless coverage that lasts all day. It blends seamlessly with my skin tone, giving me a natural, radiant finish. What I love most is its ability to control shine without feeling cakey. Plus, it’s packed with skincare benefits that leave my skin feeling nourished and healthy. This foundation truly lives up to its name, offering a perfect complexion from morning to night. Dior has outdone themselves with this exceptional product. Highly recommended!

This foundation stick is a great addition to any makeup routine for a polished, yet effortless appearance.

You’ll need to shave your face because it picks up every hair and pore. It looks great on camera but in person I just felt cakey. I would recommend you go get a sample and test out if the shades and texture are right for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

It’s creamy easy to blend in!

reviews.review_text: This foundation is a stick formula. It has very good coverage and it blends out really well. It matches me perfectly. I would for sure repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tbh i chose the wrong color and it is dark for my shade. I am using it as a contour . I am really loving it. It has a really nice coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation stick goes on so creamy, I was astonished to see how quickly it blended into the skin so effortlessly. I would say this is a lightweight, buildable foundation that has a realistic natural soft finish. If you’re a fan of the Dior backstage face and body foundation, you will absolutely love this formula. As a male client, I really wanted a foundation what wasn’t clockable; this second skin is it. I also have oily skin and found this didn’t break apart throughout the day and did a great job keeping that shiny look at bay. I wear a 4N in the liquid formula and found this stick version an identical twin. This product is made in Japan and feels absolutely luxe in hand, everything you expect from Dior.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: You can build coverage to the needed level, it’s more like medium coverage so doesn’t look heavy on the skin. Texture and finish are rich in pigmentation which gives that nice glowy finish look. Package is great, stick foundation never leaks out in your purse.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine

reviews.review_text: First time trying this DIOR foundation, the packaging is very practical, the texture of the foundation feels soft, very easy to blend, the coverage it offers is very good, you don't need to apply another layer to achieve beautiful skin, my favorite part is that it doesn't My skin feels heavy with this foundation. I put the foundation to the test on a hot day, within 5 hours of having the foundation on my skin still looked nice. I LOVED HER 🥰

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved a good foundation stick, and this is seriously a good one. I have shade 1n. I am so impressed with it. It is long wearing for sure, and can withstand some heat. We had hot days recently. It withstood around 85 degrees, but we did have a 92 degree day and I wore this and literal pouring sweat did take a bit off. But, it didn’t change my opinion about it. It’s still great.

reviews.review_title: Good as contour but not long lasting as foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Foundation Stick for free from Influenster and Dior in exchange for my honest opinion.   Sadly, I was disconnected from the internet when the claim popped up, so I ended up getting a shade that’s a bit too dark for my complexion. However, I’ve been testing it out as a contour (shown in picture below!), and I really like the feel of the formula and how blendable and pigmented it is. The texture is very smooth and it's easy to apply with a brush.  I was still interested in testing this out as a foundation, so I adjusted the tone to make it lighter using a white color corrector from L.A. Girl. I mixed the foundation with the color corrector on the back of my hand and applied it with a brush. The white mixing pigment isn't supposed to change the formula or texture of the foundation, so I got a good sense of how it wears throughout the day.  Initially, it looked really beautiful on and gave a blurred/smooth look to the skin. I would say this is a medium-full coverage foundation, and I didn't have any issues layering other products on top of it. It's advertised as a 24-hour wear foundation, but in my opinion, after about 10 hours, it started looking more textured and very shiny, as you can see in the picture (I included a before and after). I have dry skin, so that was a bit surprising since I usually only notice a bit of shine around my nose after wearing makeup for longer periods (8+ hours).  Honestly, I think I prefer using this as a contour rather than a foundation. I'm not sure if the color corrector changed the formula or the way this wears throughout the day, so it would be hard to give my final opinion without trying it in my correct shade. Still, I would say that other foundations I own have lasted better throughout the day. Overall, I don't think this is a bad product—I appreciate the ease of applying a stick foundation compared to a liquid, and I will definitely continue to incorporate this into my routine as a contour.

reviews.review_title: All day coverage - does not transfer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all of Dior’s make up products and I was super excited to try this foundation stick! The fact that it comes in a stick I thought was super convenient and made applying it much easier versus a liquid foundation. I applied it to my   face and the color match was perfect for my skin tone. It blurred my blemishes to the point that you could not even see them anymore! I also noticed that it made my face feel more hydrated and smooth. I applied this before work in the morning and it lasted until I washed my face in the evening. I was pleasantly surprised to see minimal - if any - transfer onto my clothing! This is the real deal and it just shows you get what you pay for! Definitely recommend if you are looking for a foundation stick that does it all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Instant Blur Foundation Stick, and I am absolutely in love with it! This product truly lives up to its name, providing a flawless, airbrushed finish that lasts all day. The formula is incredibly smooth and easy to apply. The stick format makes it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups, and it blends effortlessly into the skin. I appreciate how it blurs imperfections and evens out my complexion without feeling heavy or cakey. It's lightweight yet offers excellent coverage. One of the standout features for me is its staying power. Despite having combination skin, this foundation stick keeps my face looking fresh and matte throughout the day without needing constant touch-ups. It also feels comfortable and breathable, which is a huge plus. The range of shades is impressive, making it easy to find a perfect match for my skin tone. Additionally, the sleek packaging is not only beautiful but also practical for travel. Overall, the Dior Forever Skin Perfect Instant Blur Foundation Stick has become a staple in my makeup routine. It's perfect for anyone looking for a high-quality, long-lasting foundation that delivers a flawless, natural finish. Highly recommended!

Overall, I think it is a good foundation stick, and I will continue using it.

reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the versatility of this stick, as well as the texture, blendability, finish and coverage. I was able to achieve a sheer coverage which I prefer. This was a great color match for my complexion, and forgiving. It definitely covered some redness and was virtually weightless. The packaging is nice—luxe, compact, and sturdy. This has quite a strong floral scent which is totally unnecessary, and I noticed there was oil on the packaging when I took the top off that either leaked or wasn’t emulsified well…who knows. The finish of this foundation stick is wonderful. It’s natural and looks so flattering. This is genuinely my most favorite foundation product ever, and I have never said that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will be buying this product from now on. It’s Dior and it smells divine. You can use it as a foundation stick as intended or it’s perfect as a concealer stick. I use it as both depending on the day that I’m going to have. It is long lasting and does not rub off. I love how it’s small and compact for on the go if needed.
